author: {'steamid': '76561198392526412', 'num_games_owned': 1259, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2338, 'last_played': 1578110243}
review:
Как не прискорбно, но это самый бесполезный спиннофф в серии. Игра, это явная деградация по сравнению с прошлой частью(Hyperdimension Neptunia U), игра приобрела несколько новый механик, но при этом потеряла кучу по сравнению с прошлой. Я могу посоветовать вам в неё поиграть только если вы ярый фанат серии, если же нет, но вы хотели бы познакомится с этой серией, лучше купите Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth1.

Плюсы:
1).Сеттинг,
2).Музыка,
3).Введение ещё нескольких новый играбельных персонажей
4).Появление полноценного мультиплеера

Нейтральное:
1).Мне не понравилось как переозвучили некоторые фразы старых персонажей,
2).Появления кулдауна для применения способностей, на замену полоске SP, при этом сами навыки стали менее эффективными,
3).Основной акцент в этой части сделан на мультиплеер,
4).Появление, на первый взгляд интересной, но оставшейся на уровне идеи механики изменения диалогов при выборе других персонажей на уровень, которая просто меняет персонажа говорящего ту же самую реплику, и лишь в паре диалогов поменялась 1-2 фразы в диалоге.

Минусы:
1).Некоторые старые персонажи потеряли приёмы при том что их и так не много,
2).Самая короткая и бесполезная сюжетная кампания из всей серии,
3).Введение самостоятельной прокачки статов персонажа и открытия комбо (раньше статы и приёмы просто прокачивались с уровнем), 
4).Прокачка персонажа теперь проходит до неприличия медленно (я после получения всех ачивок и прохождения абсолютно всех миссий и в сюжете и в мультиплеере, и перепрохождения некоторых раз по 50 раз смог прокачать только 1 персонажа до максимального уровня, остальные не ушли дальше 25-30 уровней),
5).Введение дебильной ачивки на комбо из 5000 ударов, и при этом в игре нет уровня где его можно получить без гайда и игровых читов открывающихся после прохождения сюжета, приходится лезть в гайд, брать юни, скидывать её статы на 1 уровень, включить чит на бессмертие и сопротивление отбрасываниям от атаки врага и идти долбить кнопку лёгкой атаки на последнем боссе сюжетной кампании, при этом с первого раза у вас ничего не выйдет так как этот счётчик комбо сбрасывается ну очень быстро, так что после этого ваш палец и джойстик или клавиатура скажут вам спасибо(Нет),
6).Игра стала до неприличия лёгкой,
7).Ни в сюжете, ни в мультиплеере нет каких-нибудь интересных миссий, все заключаются в истреблении монстров, даже миссии по сбору вещей падающих с монстров или миссий с какими нибудь особыми условиями по типу бей только навыками или убей 2 противников одновременно из прошлой части убрали, и есть только 1 немного отличающаяся от остальных, нужно найти на карте спрятанных врагов, и это также единственная миссия где используется кнопка прыжка и вертикальность уровня, так как некоторые эти враги сидят на возвышенности.
8).Как по мне мультиплеер при всей своей короткости и однообразности, это слабая замена арене, Башни Нептрала, и сайдквестам из сюжетной кампании Hyperdimension Neptunia U.

Мой вердикт, даже при том что это спинноф серии он плох, игра по эмоциям не отобьёт потраченное на её прохождение время. Если рассматривать её как просто игру, в разрез серии, то она средняя, ни плохая, ни хорошая, в неё можно поиграть и получить от этого удовольствия, типичная игра на 1-2 вечера.
Моя оценка её как части серии 5\10
Как самостоятельной игры 6,5\10

Спасибо тем кто дочитал, но не верьте мне на слово, если вам действительно интересна эта игра, то скачайте её с торрента, и если понравится потом купите её, это моё мнение и оно вполне может отличатся от вашего, и если это так то не нужно бежать в коменты и писать "обзор хрень, автор идиот и ничего не понимает", а просто напишите с чем вы не согласны и мы вполне сможем это обсудить, поэтому всегда имейте своё мнение и не позволяйте кому-то навязывать его вам. Ещё раз спасибо и удачной игры.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007666574', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 953, 'last_played': 1577941167}
{'steamid': '76561198082881386', 'num_games_owned': 1591, 'num_reviews': 307, 'playtime_forever': 1233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1233, 'last_played': 1577743114}
review:
If you are allergic to adorableness - this game will kill you.
Beeing cute is only selling point of this game so cute-factor is overwhelming here. 

Beside that - it's barebone arena hack 'n' slash.
If you play with the same characters from the beginning - you will finish it in 5-7 hours. If you like to change characters you will encounter some fights that are too hard for you... because all levels are level based - if you want to play with a lot of characters (and you have to do it to unlock hidden scenes) you will spend some time on replaying the same levels.
You can choose from various clothes... but you have to find them first (5 parts each set) and it's random.
There is a lot of hidden stuff there - but it all requires high ammount of grinding to unlock.

Also don't even think about playing this without a controller.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136481666', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 669, 'last_played': 1509713108}

author: {'steamid': '76561198422485424', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 1975, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 787, 'last_played': 1672805976}
review:
這是一款以布蘭為主角的《戰機少女》系列遊戲，故系背景的設定是四女神來到私立遊戲學園就讀，然而卻因為少子化的情況日益嚴重，造成入學的新生不足，讓這所學校面臨了廢校危機。同時，學校內的學生還因為不明原因出現殭屍化的現象，災情還遍及整個山區和都市。QWQ身為女主角的布蘭，受到電影社社長妮普禔努的拜託之下，一方面要想辦法找出讓學生殭屍化的罪魁禍首，另一方面也要身兼導演的職責，借助殭屍來拍攝一部精采的殭屍電影，藉此來吸引新生入校，讓學校免於廢校的命運。^^
如果和我一樣是使用鍵盤操作的玩家，在遊戲的操作方法上面，可能需要花稍微多一點時間去適應，不過遊戲一開始的任務都非常簡單，玩家可以透過這些簡單的任務去熟悉操作方式，為角色提升等級，來提升角色的生命值、攻擊力、防禦力與技能，並且賺取信用點，到商店購買新的武器、道具與寶物，等到慢慢進行到後面比較困難的任務時，玩家也更能夠輕鬆地擊退敵人並完成任務，同時隨著故事劇情的發展，也會有更多的角色可以提供玩家來遊玩。^^
而我認為這款遊戲最成功的地方，是在於劇情方面很具有創新性，而且既輕鬆又好笑，讓玩家在進行遊戲的時候，不僅能夠享受橫掃殭屍的快感，穿插的遊戲劇情也可以讓玩家更期待後面的劇情發展。^^另外，在遊戲主選單的布蘭，還會依據當下的遊玩日期，用不同的方式和玩家打招呼，例如夏天的時候，布蘭會說：「好熱啊!實在是熱過頭了。」到了秋冬之際的時候，布蘭就會說：「天氣開始變涼了」之類的話，到現在接近耶誕節的時候，布蘭還會祝大家「Merry Christmas」呢!^^這確實有讓我感受到開發團隊的用心呢!^^
最後，這款遊戲也有多人連線模式，可以讓玩家在線上和好友們一起來遊玩。多人連線的任務當中，也有更多不同種類的敵人和獎勵讓玩家去收集。已經完成遊戲主線劇情的玩家，也不妨到多人連線模式來試試身手呢!^^
對於本來就很喜歡布蘭的我來說，能夠遊玩這款遊戲，真的讓我十分滿足呢!^^喜歡布蘭的玩家，一定不能錯過這一款《MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies (Neptunia)》喔!^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198164749691', 'num_games_owned': 1128, 'num_reviews': 420, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1635187753}
review:
[b]Kurde Neptune VS Zombies naprawdę mocno mnie zaciekawiło i chciałem sobie pograć, ale niestety po pierwszym odpaleniu gra po 30 minutach się zwiesiła, a teraz dopadł mnie wieczny Black Screen :/

Pograłem chwilkę więc coś na koniec mogę powiedzieć i no dla mnie niestety za dużo nudnego tekstu, który w sumie by można było skrócić gdzieś o 70% i dać w to miejsce więcej rozgrywki, która była cholernie fajnie grywalna :D

System walki jak i model rozgrywki był przyjemny i relaksujący oraz idealny pod Co-Op, który oczywiście w grze na szczęście się znajduje!

Jak nie będziesz miał tego problemu co ja to śmiało, bo wydaje mi się, że gra to nie jest żaden cieniutki gniot :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198061544312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 788, 'last_played': 1578242853}
review:
i dont think my friend bought a game, im sure this is a propaganda software to make me like plutia
i like plutia and iris heart very good girl now im a plutia addict





Review:
I am not really a huge fan of the neptune series, not in a way that I dislike it, but more to not being too familiar with who's who and what this series is about and whatnot. I've only played Nep U which was repetitive and the Re;Birth that was a turn based rpg in which i didn't play it much because I'm not a fan of turn based anyways.

The gameplay is good, there are combos and consumables, exe drive, transformation and all the good stuff. My only complaint is that using a (PS4) controller, I had to swap my dash(circle) with R2(which had nothing mapped). Most JRPGs I've played had to press R1 or R2 to dash or evade. I do like the progression system in which you level up, spend skill points and setup your gears before the battle. It's like a simpler Nier;Automata.

Storyline is okay, it's cheesy and fills in your time as well as progress your characters. You'll probably need to play this to get the few treasures you want.

The Multiplayer is great, only if you have friends because I almost can't find a stranger's lobby and nobody joins my lobby anyways. You get access to unique missions and enemies that are not in the storyline. The progression and reward here is good too. I just wished I could transform from normal form because I'm used to it when I'm playing the campaign. And also wish that people would join the lonely me.

Overall, god I love plutia and iris heart.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075613594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1021, 'last_played': 1562479270}
review:
Até o lançamento do 4 Goddesses Online: Cyberdimension Neptunia esse era o melhor spin-off da série no estilo action rpg. Com um enredo bobo (uma escola que está para ser fechada é atacada por zumbis, e Blanc tenta salvar a escola no concurso de artes gravando um filme com os alunos enfrentando a "organização" e os zumbis), o spin-off da Blanc acaba sendo mais fácil que o esperado para a personagem mais casca grossa da franquia e traz uma série de personagens mais interessantes com os quais se pode jogar, como Nepgear, Noire, Uni e Vert. Você pode escolher apenas um personagem para a batalha ou formar duplas, podendo alternar entre os lutadores durante a batalha, e dependendo da dupla que o jogador escolhe (Uni + Noire, por exemplo), novos especiais são liberados e até a pontualçao de XP pode ser influenciada. Os comandos são bem simples e o sistema de evolução lembra o de Phantom Breaker, no qual você ganha pontos de XP e decide a quais atributos vai destina-los.

O grande pecado é que o jogo está mais para um beat'em up 3d do que um action RPG, com lutas extremamente rápidas e pouco desafio (a maioria é resolvida antes de 1 minuto). Os inimigos também não possuem uma boa A.I., causando mais problemas pela quantidade e aproximação simultânea do que pela dificuldade em si. A trilha sonora atende ao proposto bem, apesar do tema da intro ser horrível, compensando com a ending que é muito boa.

Poucos extras fecham o pacote desse jogo que, poderia ter sido tão bom quanto o 4 Goddesses Online bem antes de seu lançamento, mas fica na mediocridade. O que salva, como sempre, é a inconveniência de Neptune e os momentos engraçados entre os personagens, e até um momento muito esperado de fan service entre duas sisters.

Indicado para fãs da série e jogadores casuais que só querem passar um tempinho.

7,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198046234510', 'num_games_owned': 2489, 'num_reviews': 400, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 787, 'last_played': 1593843085}
review:
I really do like this game, but it's short. Most levels will end in a minute or two. VERY short tasks. 

It's not much of an improvement to Action Unleashed U. I would recommend that game more over this. 

That being said, I still think this game is still a recommend for me. For it's price, it's really fun. Plenty of characters, specifically I think 13, and then their transformed/HDD forms.

And unlike action unleashed, this game has online co-op, so if you and a friend have the game, it's a fun experience together. For a few people, that might just be the deciding factor to chose this over Action Unleashed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127145146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1567537537}
review:
As an avid fan of Neptunia and IFI, it is with a heavy heart that i give this game a negative review. The combat is annoying and tedious, most characters are super slow (Which beats the whole purpose of a hack n slash game) skills are practically ineffective, quests don't give enough XP to efficiently level up (By the time I finished the game I was level 27, with the max being 99, and the final boss being recommended for levels 40+), Customization is pretty bland, and there's no CG gallery, which is quite surprising and disappointing, seeing as you need special criteria to unlock and view certain cutscenes. As for the plot, it's so bare bones you'd be forgiven if you even remember there's a story by the end of the game.

The pros are that if you like Neptunia, the characters are as charming as always, so at least there's that.

2/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025102926', 'num_games_owned': 1729, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 2150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1864, 'last_played': 1599633262}
review:
OK, this is a Neptunia spinoff. As such, it features the Neptunia characters in a different game and a different environment. This clearly compares to Action Unleashed, and I'd say it does better. It's not particularly long if you just go through the story and only level one character.

Now, it's on the easy side, as always. I've only really played Neptune, and found it easy to keep her overlevelled. I don't even remember whether I took damage :-) Afterwards, while I was heading for level 99, there was never anything that could hurt her, and there's only one boss that can hurt a level 99 Purple Heart. But that's just achievement grinding, of course. I still have to kill him a few times for his rare drop.

It has some kind of multiplayer, but I don't know much about it. You can't do the story in MP, as usual. "Multiplay" is important for achievements, but worry not: all of it can be soloed no problem.

Do make sure you have a guide handy. The game doesn't tell you where to get things like treasure drops, and it does NOT tell you how to unlock the extra "backstage" scenes. Which, btw., have no english voice acting -- although it's the first Neptunia game that I've played that just plays Japanese in this case (which is better than keeping it silent).

There's another bunch of extra scenes, "alternate cuts" (the story is about making a movie...), but these are pretty bad and really just good for the achievement: it's exactly the same scene, just with two "actors" replaced.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963970096', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1007, 'last_played': 1595770254}
review:
Jeu non traduit en Français, vous êtes prévenus .

Neptunia en version Hack'n slash/beat them up . Gameplay malheureusement pas très riche, peu d'équipements .... ce qui sauve le jeu c'est vraiment la trame narrative, vraiment très drole, scénario complètement tiré par les cheveux .

Grosso modo l'histoire se passe dans un lycée, le club vidéo veut réaliser un film de zombies, mais une vraie invasion de zombies se déclare, ce qui arrange notre groupe qui n'a pas le budget pour un casting costumes/figurants/effets spéciaux de cet ampleur . Le scénario que Blanc développe est complètement pété et vaut le coup d'oeil .

On y retrouve quasiment tous les persos Neptunia, Plutia et Uzume dans le même jeu, que demande le peuple .

Comme dit précédemment; gameplay vite limité, on fait vite le tour, surtout vu le peu d'équipement à débloquer .
Le  jeu peut ne pas être compatible avec vos pilotes graphiques et ne se lancera donc pas, personnellement je n'ai réussit à le lancer qu'après mon changement de disque dur et donc la réinstallation complète de mes pilotes .

SI vous pouvez acquérir le jeu pour pas cher, il vaut le coup juste pour l'histoire, d'autant que certaines scènes peuvent être rejoués avec différents personnages .
Sinon rien d'extraordinaire .

author: {'steamid': '76561198116674216', 'num_games_owned': 710, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1581000638}

author: {'steamid': '76561198431683052', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1268, 'last_played': 1561345246}
review: It's a very obvious Vita port. The stages are short, the gameplay is limited, and the online is nonexistent unless you have other people you know personally. That said, it is by far the funniest game in the franchise with its constant zombie film and game references, 4th wall breaks, legendary 16th wall breaks, and having full knowledge that they are making the Neptunia Equivalent of The Room. It can be played in short bursts if so desired but you can also sink 6-8 hours into it if you really want to see how it ends. Even though there isn't much to really do in the game I was able to get 20 hours out of it and since it's almost always on sale I find no reason not to recommend it to anybody who is interested.

review:
Tons of fun.  Lots to tinker with.  A surprisingly, all-around robust ARPG system, that compliments the multiplayer function.  -Once you finish the main story, additional options open up that facilitate grinding characters for online.

Four Goddesses is an overall better game, in almost every respect, yet this game pulled me away from it, and currently still holds my attention.

In a nutshell, Fun off, and online.  Best to buy a friend a copy, as random online players are pretty rare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198432622447', 'num_games_owned': 37, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 890, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1598035586}
review:
Before I start the review, I'd like to say: I mostly played the multiplayer, so don't know too much about the story.

Yeah, so this game is pretty fun. I mean, I really can't imagine paying full-price, but it's worth buying if the game's on sale. The combat is decent (it isn't like Platinum Games' combat systems, but it's still good), the graphics are.. okay, considering this was a Vita port. 

The only issue I have is that the game's controls aren't optimized too well if you're using a keyboard and mouse, but with a controller it's fine. 

Too bad you can't change the controller settings. 

7/10 too many waifus

author: {'steamid': '76561198089786759', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 220, 'last_played': 1557859325}
review:
Curto e grosso: Só recomendo que você compre este jogo caso ele esteja em promoção e você goste muito da série ou queira a platina. É o jogo mais bugado da série até o momento, o menos polido e com o sistema de batalha mais ruim de todos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108235797', 'num_games_owned': 4082, 'num_reviews': 550, 'playtime_forever': 1351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1566685245}
review:
Let me start with this, i love Hyperdimension and its characters, it's certainly cliché but i love the series itself nonetheless.
But Idea Factory are really getting more and more lazy.
Not only the game is buggy and very badly optimized, loading times are a pain in the ***, but the game itself is just copy / paste from every Neptune game ever. 
Same content as always, and the gameplay is bland, boring and too easy, there is no threat nor any challenge in this game, plus it is very short.
I'm all for an action hack and slash of Hyperdimension, but at least, make it good and somewhat a bit challenging with good replay value, different enemies and different content.
It's getting really annoying to always end up with the same content in each game, party-wise, it's al right, but enemy and other content-wise, it's not okay, they'll have to change their way otherwise i'll just stop buying their games or i'll wait until they'll be like 2$, their real worth.
Because let's be honest, with such bland gameplay, same content game after game, it's not worth much at this point.
Story is kind of confusing and doesn't really make sense at all, its mediocre at best.

Despise loving Hyperdimension, its characters and its story, this game is just not worth it, and if they keep making the same games again and again, none of them will be worth it, so if you want to see a change, stop buying their game full price, they won't have a choice but to actually make new content, new mechanics, new stuff and of course, a better gameplay for those hack & slash games.

4.5/10 - Buy it only when it's about 2$ otherwise forget about it, if you have not played the Hyperdimension games, i'd started there first if i were you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198386618528', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1645797004}
review: 游戏不错，尤尼很棒，可惜没有中文（无奈╮(╯▽╰)╭）

author: {'steamid': '76561198052882776', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1859, 'last_played': 1667427341}
review:
Para esta reseña voy a dar por sentado que has jugado a Hyperdimension Neptunia U primero. 

Este juego es el segundo hecho por Tamsoft. De nuevo perteneciente al género hack'n'slash aunque con muchos cambios desde el primero. Algunos muy interesantes mientras que otros un tanto desagradables.

Empezando directamente por los buenos tenemos el Multiplayer. Como ya te habrás imaginado, 3 años despues del lanzamiento vas a necesitar contar con amigos para jugar en grupo, sin embargo no te preocupes, ya que todas las misiones se pueden completar en solitario.
Otro cambio muy importante ha sido el hacer que los lily ranks se incremente en solo 1 mision en lugar de 3. Algo de agredecer a la hora de completar el juego por completo.

Tambien se ha modificado la forma en la que funciona el equipo. En lugar de contar con diferentes armas y accesorios, en este juego utilizarás armas que a la vez se equipan con idea chips y unos accesorios especiales llamados "parts" que se desbloquean en el multiplayer. He de decir que tardé muchísimo en descubrir como funcionan los chips de arma y casi no he encontrado información al respecto en internet. Por otra parte, las parts solo aportan unos pequeños bonus defensivos por lo que al final en lo único en lo que te fijarás será en el atributo de tu arma y la debilidad del enemigo.

Por otra parte, a los 10 personajes de la entrega anterior ahora podemos sumar otros 4: Plutia, Peashy, Uzume y Tamsoft. Con sus respectivas transformaciones.

Aunque no todos los cambios son buenos. Los combos han cambiado de una entrega a otra eliminando, entre otras cosas; la posibilidad de enlazar facilmente un combo con otro, lo que provoca que la fluidez del combate se vuelva un tanto espesa al quedarse tu personaje demasiado tiempo parado en mitad de una animación final o simplemente por no poder hacer ciertas acciones en ciertos momentos. Desgraciadamente este es uno de los puntos más negativos del juego ya que además han aumentado la dificultad respecto al anterior título considerablemente.

Y precisamente de dificultad va el siguiente punto: Esta vez, al subir de nivel nos darán la opcion de gastar puntos de atributo en cuatro categorías: ataque, defensa, salud y combo. Da la casualidad de que si aumentas tu defensa lo suficiente llegará el momento en que ningún, en serio, ningún enemigo del juego te podrá hacer daño. Lo que reduce las peleas a una molestia mas que un desafío.

Otro punto que quizá a alguno le resulte interesante es que ya no existe el costume break. En lugar de ello tendremos los trajes normales y los trajes rotos para equipar desde el principio, y los personajes que no formaban parte del juego anterior no tendrán versión rota. No es algo que afecte a la jugabilidad, pero quizá a alguien le parezca importante a la hora de decidir.

Y la historia: pues como todos los juegos es sencilla y absurda. Vale para echarse unas risas a costa de las voces y caras de las protagonistas y poco más. Hay algún detalle bastante interesante pero que prefiero no destripar.

En conclusión: recomiendo el juego por que a pesar de sus fallos me ha entretenido mucho. Sin embargo tened en cuenta que la entrega anterior es muchísimo mejor en la mayoría de aspectos. Así que si no lo habéis jugado tal vez debáis empezar por ahí y decidir que hacer a partir de eso.

review:
本作有很有趣的諾艾兒黑歷史具體演出...

戰鬥的部分雖然跟U很像，但是第一輪沒甚麼作弊管道，所以不像U那麼好混。
雖然沒官方中文，不過對岸做得倒也夠用了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198869874381', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1581725055}
review:
This is one very good game. Like most of the other neptunia games, the interactions between the characters and the references are genius with the combat being very fun and easy to get the hang of (It also feels really good to string together combos). There are also secret 'backstage talk' scenes that add to the already funny atmosphere with accessories that can let you dress the characters like actual movie characters (I personally have neptune look like some kind of secret agent). But, this isn't a good place to start with the series (play re;birth 1 first). Don't worry about computer specs ether (I'm using a £300 laptop and the game runs well, unlike VII.)

Overall, If you haven't played any other neptunia game don't get this one first. But otherwise, GET THIS GAME!

author: {'steamid': '76561198424473885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 3753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1931, 'last_played': 1600000130}
review:
МегаБлан с Непкой против зомби...

Игра вроде такая себе, а вроде нормальная.
Расскажу я о том, что мне не понравилось и что мне понравилось

1. Режим КООПератива
В этой игре можно надирать задницы зомби максимум в четвером, мне нравится.
А так-же, мне нравится играть когда очень много квестов (Лично я их все прошел со своими друзьями)

2. Эксплоиты
Есть такой эксплойт, который мне до пuздbI понравился.
"Блок и рывок + Зажим = Ты уже на конце карты за 5 секунд"

3. Управление
Недонократно в своих обзорах на игры с Непками я писал о проблеме с управлением.
Но здесь к моей неожиданости меня тут устроило управление.

4. Режим РПГ
Что я тут имею в виду? Я подразумеваю под тем. что можно сражатся с врагами не пошагого, а в реальном времени.
Да, это создаёт малые дискомфорт после тех игр, в которые я играл, но всё-же.

5. Постоянные вылеты игры
Что мне ненравится, так это вылеты.
Потому-что они частые и бесячие.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972468905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 777, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 777, 'last_played': 1550108706}
review:
This is a half-baked Dynasty Warrior clone dressed up to look nicer than it actually is. It has a great opening sequence. It has funny characters and good artwork. The user interface is clean. There are many things to do, such as getting new weapons and costumes. The gameplay and move combos are done well and I enjoy the silliness of throwing around a stuffed rabbit or teddy bear. 

But the actual gameplay is mediocre at best. The arenas are empty and lifeless. There is very little variation to what you are doing. I feel like this is a half-finished game pushed out before it was ready. I hope they fix this in a sequel, because then it would be worth it. I imagine die-hard fans of the series would still play, but I cannot recommend this game in the current state.

The multiplayer works, but it does not add significantly to the fun factor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161658353', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1539285611}
review:
This is very strange game.

It is based off the Manga series which has all the CPU'S attending high school. Which I assume translated means an excuse to have girls in school uniform. But that is not the point at hand. This game s about the Film Club headed by our favourate protag (or should that be Neptag) Neptune and she asks Blanc to write a script. They begin to shoot a horror movie but then the students really do become Zombies and everything kicks off from there,

The combat is the exact same as in U, but this time the maps are alot smaller. Each mission is presented a scene and often you will get a different version of a cutscene if you replay a mission with a certain set of characters. The scene don't change dramatically but it can add a joke or 2 or even use the characters relationships for comedic effect.

Although this game is zany and in some areas just downright bokers it actually works. There are many hillarous scenes between Neptune and Blanc, and a sweet Nepgear and Uni scene. There is also a really funny moment between Neptune and Noire afterwards but they two always work well together.

All i can say is this game really asks of the player one thing:
Just Accept That This Is Happening

if you start to ask questions or even attempt to make sense of this game then take some asprin because this game is wacky and fun. I highly recomned and I hope you enjoy it as much as I did

author: {'steamid': '76561198137225922', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1559253675}
review:
It has Uzume in it. What more can you ask for?

Serious review below

TLDR: Get it on sale. The game is fun, but I don't feel that it's worth $25. You may not be playing it for long, but it's fun while you are.

Misc:
- No FOV slider, 0/10
- Camera can get a bit wonky at times.

Story/Singleplayer: 
It started out okay and fun, but declines in quality at Chapter 6. After that, there was too much filler and I gave up on trying to complete it. There are lily ranks if you wanna grind for that. The lily ranks give buffs, but they don't tell you how much.

Multiplayer: 
- It works, albeit with some crashing here and there. It wouldn't be a Neptunia game without some unexplainable bugs. 
- All missions can be done solo. 
- There are some filler missions, but they are a lot better than the story mode ones.
- You cannot transform in multiplayer because you can just choose the CPU/transformed form to start the missions with.

Gameplay (and some comparisons between Neptunia U):
- The game feels relaxing, as in you won't be swarmed by a bajillion enemies at close quarters all the time. Even when you are swarmed, you won't be stunlocked to death as the enemies attack way less. So when you do mess up, it's your own fault.
- The maps are waaayyyyy bigger than Nep U's.
- You can block now, thereby erasing everything wrong with Nep U.
- Some combos are locked behind leveling up the "Technic" stat. Dunno how I feel about that.
- Charge combos need more love. They leave you standing there without protection and can be easily interrupted (being attacked once), leaving you disappointed.
- Combos can't be interrupted by yourself, which is bad. Stuck doing a combo when the enemy is right about to attack you and you want to block? Sucks for you.
- Bosses and mini-bosses are annoying, just as they were in Neptunia U.
- Some bosses feel like reskins.

Overall, it's an enjoyable game and the positives outweigh the negatives.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331335454', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1418, 'last_played': 1588004833}
review:
The CO-OP menu music (EXistence) is one of the GREATEST THING IN THE WORLD!!! Man, this music is just great (At least to me). Anyway, if we talk about the gameplay, it's the same as Hyperdimension Neptunia U's gameplay but improved, so what that means is it's an arena fighter game that has so many characters in it. I'm happy that this game has most characters in Neptunia series and you can customise them too. The plot is so funny to me, it's centred around "It's so bad that I love it" and it's great. Sad part of the game is that it's story mode is super short and it doesn't have the content of the CO-OP mode, this is bad because if you don't have a friend to play this with you then the story mode won't satisfy you. But if I remember it correctly, you can still play the CO-OP mode solo but I'm not sure. The CO-OP missions are great and they are better than story mode missions. Overall the game is nice and it's simple fun.

7.0/10 too much EXistences.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166231040', 'num_games_owned': 307, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 2035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1027, 'last_played': 1572885122}
review:
[OK]
- Steam Achievements is very interesting to get better playing
- Steam Cloud for playing on another Computers

- Can use Controller

review:
the first nep game i played 
not sure how i feel about this the game it self feel like DYNASTY WARRIORS  that how i see the combat in this game the single player of the game is very short it only take 3 hour and a half with abit of back tracking test other characters weird control it take me and 1 - 2 hour to get use to it i dont care about the cutsences becuase i dont want to but still you can watch it in the gallery aleast the the game dont force you to use certain character but the main story focus on blanc and neptune there also other cutsences for other character for certain mission characters will unlock at later on the story is ok

author: {'steamid': '76561198811640321', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1536922459}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013901762', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1537852532}
review:
After playing almost all Neptunia games on console/Vita, I had to try this weird spin off on Steam. By the way, Im so happy that all Neptunia games have been ported to PC, it really made my life better.
Idea Factory, as the name suggests, is a company that loves to explore and experiment different genres within the same franchise. Hyperdimension Neptunia was a JRPG, while this specific game is an action game. The result? I can't say that it's great but it's not bad either. I don't believe people were actually expecting something from this game, but nevertheless it is a very light hearted game, with a very funny story. The classic lewd moments in the dialogues are here, aswell as the ecchi stuff. The gameplay itself is really pretty straightforward containing some combos and a lot of button smashing. Soundtrack and almost all scenarios are basically a copy pasta from the other games. Also, the way you can customize acessories and adapt them to the characters is kinda impressive, making customization nice.
Well, Zombies is a over used theme that can cause boredom, but it does not matter here. All that matter is NEP NEP.

NEP NEP/10 great game

author: {'steamid': '76561198811929085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1323, 'last_played': 1567899353}

author: {'steamid': '76561198079613560', 'num_games_owned': 648, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1549485983}
review:
I mean, it's a hack n'slash action Neptunia spinoff. What do you expect? The storyline is exactly what you'd expect of a Neptunia game, complete and utter ridiculousness with funny and rarely touching scenes between the characters. If hack n'slash games aren't something you're interested in, you won't like this game. 

But if you enjoy those types of games, give it a try. I'd probably suggest waiting for a sale though.

Also, bonus points: CPUs in schoolgirl uniforms.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106146020', 'num_games_owned': 2110, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1534649939}
review: This is the first Neptunia game that I haven't enjoyed, and I've played all the mainline games and a couple of the spinoffs. The combat is dull and repetitive, plus the enemies and environments are even more blatantly recycled than usual. Not to mention the story just felt... bland. Not even Plutia could save this trainwreck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069159152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2420, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1533798430}
review:
This is another of the spin-offs from the Hyperdimension series. In this case, the CPUs (and candidates) have started attending school to learn more about how humanity thinks. But since birth rates are still not increasing (probably a reference to the actual issue in Japan itself), the school will likely have to close.

But Neptune has a plan! Make a zombie movie! Very quickly, Blanc (the protagonist) is roped into writing and directing, and the game pretty much goes from there.

The game has a decent plot and thrilling battles. It is not that different from other Neptunia titles (or for that matter, Idea Factory games).

You might wait for a sale, but I can recommend this title.

author: {'steamid': '76561198311033261', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1557034091}
review:
结论为不推荐
原因如下：
此款游戏打击感一般
致命的是角色普通攻击硬直严重，且只有普通攻击的第一下和部分攻击可以被防御打断。
但是角色攻击可以被敌人攻击打断，这点非常影响游戏体验。（不过由于主线剧情难度不打，对游戏通关影响不大）
角色攻击动作结束之前不可改变角色方向。
由于上述原因导致了一个结果，角色很难做到高连击出招，这点非常影响本游戏的两个成就的获得（1000连击及5000连击成就）
所以并不推荐海王星粉丝及一般玩家购买

author: {'steamid': '76561198039797839', 'num_games_owned': 828, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 1082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1082, 'last_played': 1531495407}
review:
Очень долго думал ставить /\ или \/ на отзыв к игре, но все таки поставлю /\
А теперь по порядку. (сравнение пойдет от первой части экшн непты - нептуния анлишед)
-
1) Механика боя - по сравнению  с AU она просто ужасная, сухая и твердая как кора дерева
2) Обучение и геймплей - сделали это примерно так, "Мы те даем все что было в AU сразу с 1 миссии сюжета, вот те туториал по фасту, дальше делай что хоч"
3) Сюжетная боевка - вообще 0, на протяжении 12 эпизодов, будут однообразные локи с кучкой кукол, которые крашатся крутилкой+ультой Бланк
4) Продолжение - 12 эпизодов кончились и усе, ни те хард кв, ни турниров, ни таверок

+
5) ВН - тут все хорошо, сюжет не замысловатый с юмором, все красиво, анимировано, яп озв топ
6) Новые фичи - по типу аксессов, шмотки, сундуки, крафт
7) Новые игровые персонажы - мне они все понравились, а Tamsoft топчик ваще
8) Кооп - ну тут на любителя но с друзьяшками можно убить время   

ИТОГ
В общем плане игра больше походит на ВНку чем на экшн-рпг, был бы режим\мод сугубо чтения вн было бы круто =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198029587520', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1530996629}
review:
The plot was simple and enjoyable with the usual shenanigans. It focuses mainly on Blanc and to some extent Neptune, everyone else gradually comes along. Main selling point of the game imo, very lighthearted fun.
The gameplay is there to kill time, I personally beat the game with Noire and Plutia and some Tamsoft. Its nothing difficult as long as you upgrade corresponding to when you get your skill points and sword upgrades.
I havent gotten to try the multiplayer yet so no opinion on that as of now.
Recommended if you're invested in the series or want to get into it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198376324820', 'num_games_owned': 1150, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1530536019}

级别什么的设定显得有点多余，最终boss推荐级别是35（好像）。但是我用两个16级的黑灵心姐妹把boss给A死了

author: {'steamid': '76561198044998881', 'num_games_owned': 1203, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1530117893}
review: MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies (Neptunia), purtroppo, non è un titolo molto coinvolgente. È l'unico spin-off della serie che NON sono riuscito a portare avanti e completare per via della sua ripetitività nel gameplay e una trama banale. Nonostante mantenga l'humor conosciuto nella serie che aiuta a spezzare la monotonia, in questo capitolo è troppo pressante da renderlo fastidioso. Il gioco in se è un prodotto valido ma che non supera le aspettative e le fondamenta gettate dai suoi predecessori. Se siete fan della serie, compratelo e provatelo (magari quando è in sconto), sicuramente a molti di voi piacerà molto più di me!

author: {'steamid': '76561198064317950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1545378375}

author: {'steamid': '76561198090828725', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1537699702}
review:
ซีรีย์ เนปจูน ภาคนี้น่าจะเป็นภาคเกือบจะล่าสุดและ เป็นภาคที่แทบจะดึงภาค U มาทำเลย
ข้อดี
 -ภาคนี้สามารถเล่นแก้เบื่อเหมือนภาค U ได้
 -ตัวละครที่มีให้เล่นมีเพิ่มขึ้นจากภาค U
 -อูซึเมะ ค่อนข้างจะ OP มากๆ ถ้าเราอัพเน้น ATK/DEF แล้วชาร์จตีเรื่อยๆ แม้จะเป็น Final Boss ก็ไม่กลัว
ข้อเสีย
 -ภาคนี้มี CD จากการกด สกิล ทั้งที่ภาค U ไม่มี ทำให้เรา สแปมสกิล แบบภาคเก่าไม่ได้แล้ว 
 -ภาคนี้ตัวเทพๆจากภาค U อย่างเนปๆ ที่ตอนภาค U นี่ Meta ดีๆนี่เอง ภาคนี้ได้ปรับให้คอมโบไม่ต่อจนเป็น Infinity Combo และให้เราต้องหัดคอมโบใหม่

author: {'steamid': '76561198011138048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1519068764}
review:
劇情極度尷尬，尷尬到我劇情都是用跳的。
遊戲性來說可能是這系列裡最棒的。
如果硬要從超次元系列裡推一款給非粉絲的人，這款大概是唯一值得推薦的。
很多角色可供選擇，可以依自己的喜好配置出戰角色。
不過遊戲過程很短，非常短，以688這個價格來說，建議還是特價再入手比較好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198313465449', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 7535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3327, 'last_played': 1704599540}
review:
I love this game. Nice light hearted and fun story as you would expect from a Neptunia game with some memorable and cute moments. The combat is decent and button combos are not too difficult to master. Only downside is that sometimes it can take ages to find a room in multiplayer just gotta be playing at the right time.

Controller Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121521491', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4264, 'last_played': 1588538540}
review:
The story mode is pretty short, but don't mind it. All the fun is in the multiplayer, which unlike people say, not entirely dead. You can still find people to play with and even get a 4-stack. Some combos are long, but simple, it also has aerial combos that you don't use often. Has animation cancels that add to controllability.

And the most important thing is that it has the best accessory system ever. You can place them on any body part, rotate and resize in the most ridiculous ways possible, [url=imgur.com/a/xuPmoAP]like this dude here[/url]. 

Overall good game, tho i'd advise you to wait for sale.

[spoiler] Don't skip the Thursday multiplayer special quest, it gives you 50k skill points for all your characters that will make them ready for endgame even on less than lv20 [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198264647082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1528814535}
review:
这款游戏的剧情没什么营养。
从头到尾打一遍需要5个小时。
手感方面很粗糙，远远不如海王星V。
从前作中拿出来的建模直接用可以看出比较偷懒，算是个套壳游戏。
每个角色都有自己的技能和连段，然而日本游戏的通病，你可以一个套路不需要动脑的玩到底，完全不用考虑打法和配置，你掌握了使用连携技的节奏基本没什么难度，和mmo网游的玩法没有区别，所有角色都能使用连携技能，所以尽管这个游戏准备了大量可用角色，但是没什么意义。
本人使用xobx手柄打这款游戏，可以看出 ，键位基本完全照搬原作的psv版本，这点很不用心，无论是DS4手柄还是xbox手柄玩这款游戏都会存在明明有大量键位闲置，但是还是要使用组合键释放招式的情况，建议移植者买个微软手柄实际玩一下再重设键位，然后放进游戏内的设定选项里面。
这款游戏并不是一无是处，我们对它定位一下，它不是什么3A大作，甚至不是2A游戏，在打折的时候购入，是物有所值的，这款游戏的画质不错，配音演出很到位，一场战斗往往只需要一分钟左右，低配置的机器用来消遣是不错的选择，每个角色都可以培养，如果喜欢她们，倒是可以尝试练满看看的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198133118458', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1011, 'last_played': 1528647818}
review:
Скучная гринделка (без гринда), в которой может найти место только отчаявшийся фанбой Нептунии и co.
Игра на один раз, мультиплеер мертвый, геймпад обязателен, я пока играть без геймпада не пробовал, но я думаю, что это делать не стоит вовсе. Первое время выглядит увлекательно, потоиу что это уже не пошаговая стратегия, а какой никакой слешер, но быстро наскучивает. К покупке не советую, если решили познакомиться с серией. Для русскоязычных тем более, там вашего русификатора не будет, потому что переводить тут особо нечего.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264857276', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1529668831}

author: {'steamid': '76561197961951106', 'num_games_owned': 1565, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 798, 'last_played': 1528048155}
review:
This is another brawler from the Neptunia universe and I'm glad to report it's better than [url=https://store.steampowered.com/recommended/recommendgame/387340]the previous one[/url] - which was already decent! The gameplay feels better refined, more complex with more of everything. More stat items (weapons) and surprisingly deep customization options. New and interesting characters (♥Tamsoft). Better graphics and dialogue art; alternative scenes. It's obvious to me that the developers learned a lot from Action Unleashed and moved to improve their game.

The one thing that might be aggravating are the achievements, but only if you're a completionist. They require significant grinding and also involve multiplayer - which is dead. Since this is a very touchy subject for me, it might have singlehandedly tipped the scales in favor of thumbs down. I didn't go down that road only because a generous player shared their savegames in a Steam guide. Chances are it's still up.

So yeah. This is not a brawler of DMC caliber, again. But it's a solid addition to the Neptunia IP, building it up (don't really care how canonical it is). Also [spoiler]Uni x Nepgear[/spoiler] is [i]even better[/i] than [spoiler]Nepgear x Vert[/spoiler]. I hope this is a thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198360236214', 'num_games_owned': 377, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 2286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1824, 'last_played': 1589019784}
review:
打折入的海王星动作游戏合集0v0
————
刚开始玩没有手柄，不管怎么设置键鼠都是反人类的操作（光是单个按键就算了还有各式各样的组合技……键鼠差点第一关都过不去，干脆无脑拍键盘）后来买了个xbox的手柄瞬间感觉游戏体验几何级数上升！什么招数随便放！
————
- 画质不太好，移植游戏摆在那
- 键鼠操作反人类
- 没有官中，三大妈的有bug可能闪退
- 打击感不太好，判定有点需要习惯
- 全屏模式有不能载入、载入卡顿的bug，建议窗口化或者无边框窗口
- 锁定敌人后一套连招视角鬼畜抖动，不锁定就日常空大，很迷
- 剧情比较短，几个小时就能通
- 重复刷材料注意
————
+ 可选人物很多，风格各异
+ 服饰搭配（需要收集物品解锁）和小饰品很多，小饰品可以随意调整位置
+ 难度不高，上手容易（如果你有手柄）
+ 有多人联机，体验还不错
++ 萌
————
本来不算海王星系列的粉丝，先看的动画再买的游戏
[spoiler]（推销日本西瓜？不知道的孩子呢0v0）[/spoiler]
现在说不清楚这种感觉了

author: {'steamid': '76561198042441756', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 923, 'last_played': 1526882451}
review:
É um jogo de hack n' slash de menininha bonitinha, a jogabilidade é até boa.

A história é desinteressante, simplesmente elas querem gravar um vídeo de terror, ai faz vc ficar enfrentando horas e inimigos, coisa mais no sense que ja vi. Esse jogo não tem relação com o primeiro hack n' slash da nep, o primeiro é bem melhor.

No pós game, tem missões que você pode fazer online e até mesmo sozinho, para coletar algumas proezas, porem tem algumas coisas que é grind puro.

Se você gosta da Nep essse jogo pode valer a pena. Nunca no preço full

6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198086457357', 'num_games_owned': 1222, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1525022035}
review:
Semi-competent fighting game, rather on the easy side, with rather bland and short "dungeons" and a so-so story (the story is very "meta" and tongue-in-cheek, as usual with the Neptunia series but it's not at its best in this game). It's not a bad game per se, but I'm downvoting it, because there are lots of more interesting games around at a much lower price (there are already too many upvotes in steam as it is, so, we must make a distinction between the better games and the not-so-good games).

Cute Nep girls, but that doesn't save the game. Even during sales, you can skip this one in my opinion.
I don't usual finish "Nep" games, so if you're a fan of those, you may think otherwise, though this one is definitely not the best in my opinion

author: {'steamid': '76561198097903526', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1776, 'last_played': 1525724349}
review:
I recommend this game but only if you like this kind of games.
There are 14 playable waifus. The story is silly, sometimes fun, a los of times pointless. The gameplay is fun but not so great. The game has problems with full screen, it crushes. There are only a few people to play multiplayer, so you should expect to play alone. The voice acting was great, I liked a lot, both versions. The game is short, the story takes 5-7 hours, and to complete the rest with all the extras and achievements takes 20 hours more.
So, that sums up my impression of the game. Have fun with the waifus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198175045697', 'num_games_owned': 38, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2029, 'last_played': 1555329574}
review:
继续补全我的海王星测评
好久不玩了我都快忘了=。=

1.这个游戏操作有一点硬核(你需要一个手柄)
2.这个游戏以布兰为主角
3.故事是女神们的校园青春拍恐怖电影救校园(拍?)
4.这个游戏比前作海王星U要整体好不少
5.这个游戏自带截图功能(360°的哦~)
6.这个游戏剧情上是日常卖萌(性感诺瓦贝露在线直播哭泣)
7.这个游戏可以联机,游戏体验性非常好(比起四女神简直好的不行)
8.这个游戏难度不高,剧情较短,大部分在联机上
⑨.这个游戏成就需要很多的时间(地雷社教你刷材料)
10.差不多了,买吧!

author: {'steamid': '76561198041636869', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 2464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2464, 'last_played': 1523152656}
review:
The latest game from the Neptunia series I’ve played. This is one of the action games, while I prefer the  RPG / Tactical ones. It is still fun, but I admit I didn’t bother completing all of the achievements, it didn’t grab me enough to be worth spending an additional 10 hours grinding the last items I needed. Some of the bosses had way too many hitpoints, so even though I had so much defense they couldn’t damage me, it still took too long to finish the fights. 

Worth picking up, but wait for a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198201674099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 4136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1693762094}
review:
très très bon jeu. Moi qui adore la série Neptunia (NEPU !) Je peut que vous le conseiller !
au niveau du mode SOLO :
- On retrouve tous les personnages de la série "Hyperdimension Neptunia The animation" ce qui est un très bon point.
- Les personnages sont customisable. Vous aimez pas une tenue? changez-la !
- Sur le sénario c'est du Neptunia traditionnel (scénario bien écrit, avec un sens...)
au niveau du mode MULTIJOUEUR :
- Malgrès la limitation au niveau du multijoueur je peut vous le conseiller si vous et vos amis habitez dans la même région.
Si vous habitez pas dans la même région que vôtre ami vous pourrez avoir quelques problèmes pour trouver sa session.
- Multijoueur stable : Le mode multijoueur du jeu est (pour ma part) assès stable. (tant que la connexion reste assès bonne et que l'ordinateur de l'hôte ne lag pas en fps.)

Bref, c'est du Neptunia c'est un RPG franchement pour ce genre de jeu je peut que vous le conseiller !

(NEP NEP)

author: {'steamid': '76561198011552490', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1522605459}
review:
Low effort port due no Mouse control support.
Pure KB or controller, is not what i call PC port friendly.
I'm not gonna try to play this game on full KB control (+ not gonna buy a controller for this) which is basically standard seperated in 3 sections:
- wasd + qr (movement+skill)
- ikol (basic attack, jump, etc)
- numpad 2456 (camera movement)
Who has 3 limbs to control this?
Enough said i guess...

author: {'steamid': '76561198249519674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1570852706}
review:
mesmo elemento do hyperdimension neptunia u só que com mais personagens jogaveis, zumbis e um multiplayer que aumenta a vida util desta serie que desta vez é protagonizado pela blanc (só falta gente para jogar online que infelizmente está praticamente vazio).

mesmo que muitos não tenham gostado do game, eu faço questão de recomendar este game na steam e sim, eu vou pegar também a versão de ps vita quando possivel!

só a idea factory e a compile heart fazendo jogos top da serie neptunia (desde as plataformas playstation da sony) e torço muito que saia para outras plataformas (como o switch da nintendo e xbox one da microsoft).

author: {'steamid': '76561198255360938', 'num_games_owned': 160, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1508, 'last_played': 1673185683}
review: This is honestly a pretty good spin off for Blanc, even though she may get a little boring sometimes.(At the end the characters even poke fun at that). If you are into the Neptunia series as a whole, I'd recommend palying through this because it still has that Nep game feel to it, lots of good new jokes and good replay ablilty. It's also very fun with a friend, especially spamming voice commands.

author: {'steamid': '76561198280800731', 'num_games_owned': 276, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6350, 'last_played': 1519540475}
review: 唉，我和你讲，这瓜超甜的，买了大半年之后才写了一篇迟来的评测啊哈哈，当初买来和pong友一起刷刷刷的联机箱子。不过后来就没啥人玩了，应该是玩法有点单一吧，这次操作的女神好评特别多的女神都可以自由操作还有其他的联动可以使用，这款游戏非常的休闲的(摸了摸自己的秃头)。当成一个休闲养成游戏玩也是还行。喜欢海王星系列萌豚粉们 。还不交出你们手中的压岁钱(g胖微笑)，我才不是因为没有某游戏玩才来挂这个游戏呢完全不是(啊啊啊啊啊没有四女神ol玩我要死了)，希望可以在下次的游戏找到更多的乐♂趣。

author: {'steamid': '76561198075466721', 'num_games_owned': 771, 'num_reviews': 287, 'playtime_forever': 2049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2049, 'last_played': 1515885898}
review:
my review for this Masterpiece:

Good:

+ good graphics for a port
+ playable at 4K (game still stretch 1920  to full 4k), fiddle with graphic console settings. and voila great game with 4k smooth graphics....
+ great effects
+ some new cool tracks
+ easy story
+ cool conversations
+ many chars to choose from
+ many new maps
+ online multiplayer
+ interesting cutscenes
+ lovely artwork
+ easy to control
+ great effects and realisation of movements
+ new Monsters
+ good customizeable accessory (resize, make bigger etc.)
+ interesting chars with many variations in fighting styles (all have there ups and downs)
+ Blanc, Iris Heart, Black Sister, Uni, Dengikiko
+ best Zombie voices from voice actors (best is Dengikiko)
+ great japanese voiceover as ever (english: just NO)
+ cool background and visuals as ever
+ cool soundtrack
+ easy navigation in menues
+ all in 4k greatness, looked so much better then the native 1920
+ much to laugh about 


Bad:
- some screen tearing
- fps drops from 60-50 sometimes
- minor crashes
- multiplayer is pretty easy
- some audio tearing

as great as the game is. it is sure short. i am a slow player and finished around 25 hours the storyline. 100% gameplay was finished in additional ~15 hours or so. i hope next time the gameplay gets a lot bigger. Neptunia U was great too and this game is great too. the graphics are smoother, movement too. but you need a good pc to cover the medium port. i give the whole game 95% it sure is great....

author: {'steamid': '76561198155870927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1515124211}
review:
Computer Specs:

AMD Ryzen 7 1700 CPU
AMD Vega 64 GPU
32GB RAM
2TB Mushkin Reactor SSD

Cannot run the game past the second level of Chapter 2. It just freezes and crashes the moment I gain control of whichever character I select. I know the system requirements say that the game may not run well on AMD processors but this lack of optimization is just plain unacceptable.

Impressions (of the limited play-time I had) from someone new to the Neptunia franchise: English voice acting is rather bad, like "one person does most of the characters" bad. Story is mostly just there as an excuse for the gameplay to exist, and the AI is really dumb. Controls are loose and combos have no "feel" to them. Startup takes a while due to all the logos that will play before you get to the Title Screen. Needless to say, I'm getting a refund.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282047494', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1265, 'last_played': 1514901038}
review:
与海王星正作不同，本作算是一个番外故事。为了拯救在游汐葉界中就读的学校，电影社社长Neptune带着文学少女Blanc，学生会副会长Noire，学生会会长Vert站出来成为偶像，呸，拍了部丧尸片。
在剧情方面，因为本作跟正传也没什么关系，所以剧情还是挺轻松搞笑的，声优们的表现也可圈可点，对于喜欢海王星系列的玩家还是值得一玩。
对于成就党而言，该作的成就获取难度也算是较低，除了打倒所有种类敌人需要细心不要漏怪和5000连击需要点技巧，剩下的成就基本不是通关送就是无脑刷，全成就还是比较容易的（虽然本人没有）。成就神作，值得一刷。
不过作为一款ACT游戏，本作的战斗还是有地方不太友好。永远锁到杂兵的锁定，不是XXXX就是XYXY的连招（大概是设计时候偷懒了），砍掉了不少连招套路，也降低了不少战斗时的乐趣，比较遗憾。
还有就是角色要跑到指定地点时才能刷怪，如果对地图不了解很容易出现跑一圈地图才找到刷怪点的蛋疼情况，而通关评价还跟通关时间挂钩......
总之优缺点并存，但是作为原发于PSV上的外传游戏，我觉得还是值得好评的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198008303595', 'num_games_owned': 893, 'num_reviews': 554, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1515459192}
review: If you're looking for an introduction to the beat 'em up genre, look no further - as MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies is a prime choice for just that very purpose. That said, anyone else may have a hard time finding a challenge, and the story just isn't all that cohesive or memorable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198408109317', 'num_games_owned': 439, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 455, 'last_played': 1511774968}
review:
Idea Factory and Compile Heart games have a notrious reputation for being low-effort, and what do you get if you take their most popular Neptunia franchise and make a spin-off? The most medicore low-effort forgetable game.

Neptunia games live and die off their writing and even though the actual quality is rather debatable Megatagmention hits a very low point. The plot tries to sell its self on its cast trying to save its high school by making a zombie movie using the current sudden zombie outbreak to attract more students. It really, really tries to get into that its so bad its good category and ocassionaly there is a gem, but at all other times its meh.

Graphicaly the game looks exactly like a PSVITA game because that's what it is, and it rather bland forgetable environmen.ts. Enemies in the main campaign are a first for the series but repeat very often, while the multiplayer mode takes enemies from Action Unleashed.

Musically the game is average; some tracks such as the menu theme are above average, and transformation music for Neptune and co. are quite nice, but nothing sticks out compared to the previous mainline game Megadimension, so you won't be hearing anything on the level of 'Will be Venus' or 'Dimension Zero'.

Gamplay wise, this is where this game really shows its lackluster design. Basic hack and slash mechanics are there for all the characters, which can all perform one or two combos each, and can transorm to change up their small moveset slightly. MegaTagmention controls relatively well, combos have weight and moves are satisfying to pull off, however jumping feels very heavy and unnatural, and the double jump timing is very strick. Characters have a dodge technique whcih blasts them across the field at the speed of sound, but feels highly difficult to aim. Besides basic combos, guards and counterattacks also exist, however they can be slightly difficult to activate due to the unoptimised controller layout straight from PSVITA. Characters have 4 special attacks that they can use when their SP Gauge fills up and these can be very useful for crowd control. Characters can bring two allies into battle which can be used via a button combination that can boost attack, defense, restore HP, restore transform gauge or other effects. You'll quickly discover all you need is transofrm gauge recovery and HP recovery.

Your transformation gauge is charged by hitting enemies, and when it is filled to half or more you can transform into the CPU or a more souped up form of your current character that has different combos, different SP moves and is more powerful. It can also be used to perform powerful EXE and Lily attacks (attacks based on your bond with a different character, raises the more you fight with them). EXE attacks however have a severe oversight where they will knock enemies out of their combos, meaning it will do a fraction of the possible damage.

The two characters you chose into battle when they win (or lose) will gain experience and a boost in their Lily Rank plus money and drops, which presents a problem for the short 6-7 hour campaign. Characters that you don't use won't level up meaning that if you want to use them you will have to grind them up, meaning you will keep sticking with your tried and true character combination. This would be more of a problem if the game wasn't so easy. Enemies largely sit around and look pretty, there isn't much variation in big enemies besides hit and dash, and the game doesn't even feature a proper boss until the end of the campaign! Map design is very small and linear, and largely doesn't effect the way you fight foes. Due to the game featuring more then 10 characters in its short-campgin you won't get bored until the end.

Money can be used to buy weapons, patches, and visual accessories at the store to applly to those weapons to give to your characters to buff them making fights easier. Patches and drops can be fused together to make even better patches, and drops you obtain from mission can be used to unlock costumes for your characters. This system is rather basic, but can be fun to play around with. However, buying weapons reinforces using a minimal amount of characters for your playthrough.

From my brief 1 hour experience with multplayer, enemies from Action Unleashed are back providing much needed variety and 6 big proper bosses that should of been in the main story, alongside a use for your much stronger weapons. Multiplayer gets rid of allies, Lily attacks, and bring two characters in exchange to work together with 3 other players, being able to freely revieve them, and to use a character pre-transormed or that one in the base form unable to tranasofmr. Due to the higher difficultly, better play is required but not too much. I had no connection issues, and the communicatioon menu provided gives a wide range of options to say phrases that translate to other languages well. 

In closing, MegaTagmention Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies is a medicore hack and slash game that doesn't feature anything noticable of interesting. It plays perfectly fine with some minor quips with controls and physics, but the story is very, very weak, with few funny moments typical of Neptunia games. Idea Factory and Compile Heart have showed they can make quality games with the release of Megadimension Neptunia VII, but they haven't followed through with their efforts with spin-off games. Skip this unless you are a big Neptunia wee-I mean fan AND only if it is on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972223413', 'num_games_owned': 1246, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 2534, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1771, 'last_played': 1527082315}
review:
So it took me about 24 hours to play and beat it completely, other than some achievements. By that, I mean Triple SSSing everything in singleplayer and multiplayer, and when I went to check my rank is 267 so not bad eh?

I mean, its fun, theres some customization but not a lot. I mean, if I was going to go and get all the achievements and level every character to 99 then sure it might take longer but I feel I can say I've beat everything the game has to offer. I got it on sale for five bucks, so not a bad deal for the amount of time I invested in it. But, content wise there's not a lot here. Not a lot of enemy variety, not much of a story, the maps arent very big, the combo system is pretty easy to master.

I typically avoid fighting games... and this one was still kinda fun like I said. I dont know if I could recommend it at full price so wait for a sale if you really want it, or look around for other places and not just on steam to see has the best deal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094633170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1588242450}
review:
MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies is a Hack and Slay game like Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed was. But there are some differences between those two games. MegaTagmension has a bigger selection of characters than Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed. The combat also feels faster which made this as a Hack and Slay a lot more enjoyable. The quests you do don't just take place on a big stage anymore where you have to defeat a bunch of enemies but rather on a bigger area where the enemies are sometimes scattered throughout said area. But this only applies sometimes to even rarely. Most of the enemies spawn at the same spot as you do and most of the quests can be done on this said spot. Most of the quests take place on bigger areas but most of them don't use them effectively as you only have to fight your way through the enemies at one spot. Because of this most of the quests can be done in under one minute, which also feels kinda odd when they are giving you a time limit of 30-60 minutes. Also there isn't much variety of the enemy types you are going to face. The enemies you fight at the beginning are also the ones you are going to face throughout the entire game. This also applies to all of the bosses except for the final one of course. If you get the hang of these bosses you will most likely get bored to face the same bosses over and over again. On a positive note. All of the characters you are able to play feel different and you will most likely find one that suits your playstyle best. But there is also one problem with leveling those characters. You unlock more characters as you make your way through the story of this game. The problem with that is that all the characters that join your party at a later point are at a very low level and you either have to grind with them first to use them on the current quest you have to do effectively or just ditch them and stick with the characters you used up to this point. Also the amount of EXP you get for each quest isn't as high as it used to be in Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed. It feels like you don't get enough EXP for each quest. To level up even once you have to do the same quest multiple times. So if you want to beat the story as fast as you can it may be best to stick with the characters you get at the beginning. The last point I'm going to talk about is the story. The story is enjoyable but it's not very good. To keep it short. Blanc and her friend are trying to make a movie to save their school. While they're filming a zombie virus is spreading all over their school and they have to take care of that. That's all you need to know for now. All the characters behave the way you expect them to behave and the setting is pretty refreshing for a Neptunia game. After you beat the story there isn't much to do anymore. You don't unlock additional quests or challenges. You can only play through the story missions again.

In conlusion the game is best suited for you if you are fan of the Neptunia franchise and enjoyed Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed. The dialogue is pretty funny and the game uses original music aswell as music from previous installments. The game has it's flaws but it is also very enjoyable. But due to it's short playtime I would recommend to buy this game on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108296385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2929, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2811, 'last_played': 1503879788}
review: Compared to U: Action Unleashed, I enjoyed this game much better. MegaTagmension has more characters to choose from, more upgardes and customizable features for your characters, more levels in the campaign mode, and a multiplayer mode so you can play with your friends. I'll admit that the story feels a bit forced and doesn't make much sense and like any hack n' slash game the play style can get boring rather quickly but if you can catch this game on sale it is definitely worth a buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136545980', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1509219541}
review:
this game is a disgrace of Neptunia series, it's simply not fun. the voices in menu are driving me crazy - every single button press plays a voice which is annoying. pressing together X and Y? who the hell thought it's a good idea?! The story mode is EXTREMELY linear, Neptunia U at least had some side missions to play between advancing the boring story, to make it worse all missions are on the same tiny maps over and over again, they are very short like 2-5 minutes each, the AI is dumb.
The story? Neptunia characters dressed in school uniforms are making a crappy zombie movie, that's it.
And as a cherry on top, I had some technical issues with game stuck at 20fps and everything was 3x slower than normal though it fixed itself somehow. $30 for this? nice joke. A total kusoge, it was made for handheld but still a kusoge.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999935168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1190, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 522, 'last_played': 1512316500}
review:
After 5 unskippable startup logos and a intro cutscene you have to skip each time, probably over a minute worth of garbage when you launch the game, you get to play a pretty fun game. The game's only fault I can think of is that missions take place in small areas and everything gets repetitive but the game has an amusing story and of course characters that are well known and liked among fans. The upgrade system works. The super moves are over the top awesome and always cool to watch. The character and outfit designs are great. The artwork is funny, like how some of the enemies you fight include the actual green pipes from Super Mario as enemies among other weird stuff. The sound and music are good and the controls with a xbox 360 controller are pretty solid. Playing online is fun too. I found someone to join my game and we played for about 2 hours straight just doing missions and leveling up.

8/10 Just don't tell anyone I play this k thanks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262314616', 'num_games_owned': 436, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 843, 'last_played': 1527257388}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198138530623', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1528924014}
review:
good game♥
____________________________
故事模式打完才知道怎么女神化(我可能玩了个假游戏)
单人打通联机本，心情复杂(大写的孤独)

author: {'steamid': '76561198287341683', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1544950694}
review:
差评！必须差评！尽管手动全成就了！
首先吐槽下剧情，各种莫名其妙，不过看在偏无厘头风格，这点就算了。
然后吐槽战斗，布兰是主角啊。。为什么那么难用。。那个5000连击的成就谁设置的，出来我保证打不死他，断连击好几次总算做成了。还有一些图，怪物的生成地点根本没有提示，于是我绕着地图转两三圈怪物才生成，简直有毒。
在幕后事件方面我觉得还不错，小故事都挺有意思的，还好不要求百合度不然我得刷吐血，这点给个好评。
全对话这个谁设置的我也要打死他，我是看着攻略表格解锁的，为什么同一章节同样的对话仅仅换了个人我就得再打两遍，尤其是整个第六章打了三遍，简直绝望，刷这个花掉我三四个小时，这还是在通关能开启秘技的情况下刷的。
技能点方面也很坑，主用涅普，升到99级发现还有几个地方不够升级的，而技能点已经无法再获得了。不过后来似乎触发了奇怪的bug，每个人都再拿到了5w多点，虽然是良性bug，但也得差评。
在角色数值方面，似乎伤害与防御是呈线性关系的？满级防御打后面的boss几乎不掉血。。。这样有点没意思啊。。
一些boss的走位相当风骚，尤其是兽型boss，刚玩的时候虐得要死要活的，各种空大，不过，大招不就是用来空的吗？（笑）
联机的话，也算是比较好评的，似乎怪物血量有翻倍，一般来说就是大神带萌新，有幸被大佬带过，也带过萌新，这个体验还是不错的。
联机任务刷黑历史就有点烦了，尤其是打Dark Purple/white拿宝物材料的时候，刷了十数次才爆出素材，达成全成就。要是不看攻略只凭自己摸索的话不知要猴年马月才能凑齐。。。
服装大大的好评，历代海王星都是这点让我喜欢，收集那么久的材料正是为了换装嘛。变身装的话。。我一律选择破碎装，嘿嘿。
这游戏真是让人又恨又爱，虽然嘴上要差评，但最后还是默默改成好评了，海王星天下第一！

author: {'steamid': '76561198304409919', 'num_games_owned': 470, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2146, 'last_played': 1514691496}
review:
[h1] 导语	[/h1]
  [b] [i] —"你是否曾幻想过与另一个次元中的纸片人小女孩一同在同一所高中里生活？你是否曾幻想过与心中の女神一起在高考来临之际疯狂修仙？你是否还曾幻想过在世界最危急的时刻能够像电影中的主角一样英雄救美？呃，反正我是没想过。[strike] （那就怪了。一本正经的胡说八道、又喝了吧你？）	[/strike]	[/i][/b]
  但是你是否想体验一下完全不同风格的校园+无双+伪生化危机系的海王星呢？涅普顿和布兰激次元组合欢迎你。当然，如果不是只是为了单纯来找老婆♂的话。"
[h1] 《MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies (Neptunia)》	[/h1]
  与[url=store.steampowered.com/app/387340/Hyperdimension_Neptunia_U_Action_Unleashed/] Hyper D：U	[/url]相同，更确切一些的说是U的进化版本，与同为Hack 'n' Slash的U相比多了更多的可选任务及人物，并加入了防御键，故事情节也更加引人入胜，相对于海王星历来以代表国家立场的守护女神身份为背景进行的宏大的故事主线，激次元组合反之选择了箐箐校园中的日常学习生活的设定，并将背负着国家命运的女神们的领导人身份暂时全部放下，本来相持不同政见的四位强大的守护女神在激次元组合中瞬间转变成了同级的同班同学！这样有趣的设定实在不得不令人拍手称赞，[spoiler] 令人窒息的操作	[/spoiler]这是为什么呢？因为原本就有很多恩怨纠葛的四女神们以前还可以在厌烦争斗之时回到自己的国家境内短暂避开“仇敌”休息一下，但是现在呢？如此戏剧化的后果可想而知，故事剧情发展自然非常真实且生动[strike] （时而暴力）	[/strike]。
  但说了这么多，真实的感受还是需要自己去体验的，明眼人♂不难发现这篇评测至此仍未出现任何与以往类似的哲学♂化片段，所以[strike] （江郎才尽了？不！）	[/strike]这只是为了“爱的付出”的短暂牺牲而已。[spoiler] 头上的羽翼锤仿佛随时要砸下的样子……	[/spoiler]
  游戏生活化、萌豚游戏生活化，最重要的是海王星校园生活化与我们的次元不是更加接近了吗？这才是真正的重点—To the youngth~❤；想想看年轻的你们未来的高中校园生活、以及让我们这些尚拥有一颗少年之心的成年人一起回忆一下当初我们的“热血”高校生活中的点点滴滴；这时，放下现今生活中的种种烦恼，回到家中，[spoiler] 换上钉刺♂皮革♂装，	[/spoiler]打开《激次元组合》，让我们与游戏中的她们一起携手再一次回到那个时候吧~
[h1] 游戏总评	[/h1]
  上手度很好，无论是从主机还是到PSP全系列优化做的都很到位，操作手感、特效和打击感等介于刀剑神域与无双之间，但缺点还是有的，很少但很让人在意的说；不错，就是镜头问题，相较于U的全自动化调节，激次元的设定比较反人类，战斗时的视角调节可以说是无双类游戏的命脉之一，视角需要自己手动调节、虽说有锁定敌人这么一说，但使用键盘的玩家就会相较于手柄玩家更吃力一些了。[spoiler] 小声告诉你，联机模式的特殊任务里竟然还有个小的跳台关卡~哈哈哈，想SSS？玩的时候强烈建议带一个有跳跃远程攻击+目标锁定跟踪的优妮及拉姆、罗姆[strike] （蕾姆？雾）	[/strike]吧。	[/spoiler]
  总计海王星系列目前只打过几次折，而且还都只是Sbeam春、夏、秋、冬季大折扣；So，二营长你他娘的还在等什么呢？还不快带你的兵去买啊？！

author: {'steamid': '76561198122796238', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2423, 'last_played': 1546251183}
review:
Videolarda düz vuruş ve kombolardan ibaret sıkıcı, boş ve düz bir oyun gibi görünüyor ama öyle değil oyun gerçekten çok eğlenceli hele yanınızda arkadaşlarınız varsa multiplayer modu daha da eğlenceli oluyor.

Oyunun controller ile oynanmasını şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum, klavyede oynarsanız oyun gerçekten bir işkenceye dönüşebilir.

Multiplayer modda 4 kişiye kadar birlikte oynayabiliyorsunuz, odanıza şifre koyabiliyorsunuz.

Multiplayer'daki günlük görev sistemi gerçekten hoş, oyuncuyu oyuna bağlayacak şekilde önemli itemler ve bol para veriyor.

Oyunun hem ingilizce hem japonca seslendirmeleri bulunuyor ve iki dilde de seslendirmeler gayet kaliteli (ingilizce seslendirmede ki Ram&Rom hariç ama bu benim görüşüm)

Oyunda gerçekten çok fazla karakter var ve bu karakterlerin transformlarını multiplayer da her karakter 1 level olsa bile seçebiliyoruz ama story mode da seçmek için story mode'u bitirmek gerekiyor ama oyun içinde transform olarak kullanabiliyoruz belirli bir süre için.

Biraz klişe bir hikayesi var, zombilere zombi demek imkansız ama oyun "Cute Girls Doing Cute Things" benzeri bir formatta olduğu için beni rahatsız etmedi.

Oyunda bölümleri oynayarak düşürdüğümüz Fragment'lerle kutuları açıp karakterler için kıyafetler elde edebiliyoruz, bütün kutuları açıcam diye ciddi ciddi uğraştım.

Bosslardan düşen Gear'lar ekstra statlar veriyor ama düşürmek biraz uğraştırıcı/sıkıcı gelebilir.

Verdiğim parayı kuruşu kuruşuna hak eden nadir oyunlardan biri.

author: {'steamid': '76561198392617521', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 559, 'last_played': 1655219120}
review:
百闻不如一玩，本作作为萌豚星的无双外传，和传闻一样充满欢乐的玩梗对话和萌萌哒的画风，我非常喜欢。
    先来说说好处:
1.较好的打击感，操作比较流畅。
2.可多人联机，我终于成功拉我好基友入坑
3.优秀的cv表演，日系游戏的灵魂之一
     再来说说缺点:
1.地图不够连贯，打一图一换有些蛋疼，更蛋疼的是我老丁着忘了换图
2.键鼠操作反人类，玩着手腕疼，建议买手柄，或者键盘正对自己
3.好像没啥了



其实我只想说Neptune最棒了

author: {'steamid': '76561198159064995', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1731, 'last_played': 1513005545}
review:
因为入读的学生人数骤减，所以正面临着废校的危机。其中有几位少女为了防止废校毅然站了出来，成为偶……嗯不好意思拿错剧本，是拍！电！影！全系列最欢脱的一作，目前英文文本最贴近日语原意的一作，唯一带有联机系统的一作，全成就最简单的一作，还是我家布兰做主角的一作，我当然是滋磁啊。[spoiler] 这作布兰的立绘换成侧脸，真鸡儿萌。[/spoiler]

前作U试水之后，地雷社得到的回馈和经验统统在这一做得到了体现——除了镜头距离无法调节以外和删除了爆衣系统外，各方面都相对于U有了极大的提升。难度虽然相对于U来说有不小的提升，但对稍微有动作游戏基础的玩家来说难度还是偏低，因此大可不必看数据选择自己喜欢的或者玩着爽的角色玩，个人推荐布兰、电击子和tamsoft。

布兰在U和VS里的动作不像正传里显得僵硬，女神化后更是十分的霸气，Lowee三女神的bgm也是四国里最燃的，因此即使不是[strike] 任豚[/strike]布兰粉也会玩的十分爽快；电击子依旧是空中连段最bug的存在，这一作居然一次滞空能两次空中连段，当然地面的连段也相较许多角色实用，技能十分的危险——包括了炮姐的弹硬币和夏娜的贽殿遮那，大招居然调出了SAO的UI和桐人的剑，如果哪天这游戏因版权问题下架了，那都是电击子的锅；tamsoft以自己为原型做出来的角色，不得不说十分偏心，设定巨乳，声优小清水美亚，武器太刀，招式居合，HDD化的武士盔甲和两本杂志的动物化鲜明对比，隐藏三连居合连段更是炫炸了，当然也有太脆和硬直太大的缺点，三连居合第二连不但难搓而且一旦失败中断连段硬直超大，上手难度比较高。

boss方面比较偷懒，虽然有八个，但是全部招式简单，配音敷衍，三个机器人丑的一匹，大鸟攻击模式完全就是羊库库，也就剧情里的那只双面人能看，掉落宝箱碎片和部件套装概率太低，好在难度不高可以单独刷联机任务[strike] 刷着刷着感觉自己像孤独之心[/strike]
