author: {'steamid': '76561198152826226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 826, 'last_played': 1516858877}
review: Si has jugado el Action U, este juego mejora (en parte) algunas mecanicas de este. Los combos son mas dificiles de hacer en comparacion del action U y los enemigos no son tan debiles como lo eran en Action U. Otra cosa es que no todos los combos estan disponibles desde el principio sino que tienes que invertir puntos AP que consigues subiendo de nivel para poder desbloquear mas combos lo cual lo hace un poco malo porque al inicio del juego no se puede hacer mucho. Pero en aspectos generales es un buen juego y ademas con el humor que caracteriza a la saga Neptunia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107675942', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2205, 'last_played': 1587866025}
review:
Prós:

- História derivada de uma light novel
- jogabilidade aperfeiçoada incluindo opção de dar block em ataques e carregar exe drive
- Todos os personagens principais incluindo Plutia, Uzume e Peashy que não estavam no unleashed
- Referências
- Modo multi com varias missões em co-op contra bosses gigantes OwO

Contras:

-  Não tem costume break .-.

- Pos-game online, é um ponto muito positivo quando funciona (no PS VITA) mas é um ponto muito negativo (versão de PC) que é bem frustrante... não sei se a IF resolveu os diversos bugs depois de lançar varios patchs. Um outro problema é que os servidores no PC são separados entre varias pequenas* regiões exemplo: RJ, SP, MG e não como no vita NA, EU que seria melhor agregando mais jogadores.

EDIT: Arrumaram alguns bugs e agora os servidores não são separados por região. O Co-op está jogavél sem grandes problemas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143207181', 'num_games_owned': 416, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 835, 'last_played': 1491923275}
review:
Se vi è piaciuto il NepU action unleashed, questo fa per voi.
La sensazione di deja-vu vi attanaglierà per buona parte dei combattimenti, i controlli sono stati un po' sistemati, ma non aspettatevi stravolgimenti. Credo ci sia ancora strada da fare per parlare di gioco davvero ottimo.
Non è il musou definitivo insomma, ma un buon gioco sicuramente!

Resta comunque un prodotto che se trovato in saldo, da fan della saga, prenderei al volo. Immancabile se siete fan di Blanc, che qui è main character.
Se non siete fan della saga non credo sia il titolo adatto con cui iniziare, meglio partire con i vari re;birth.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067420585', 'num_games_owned': 811, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 894, 'last_played': 1483710511}
review:
地雷社坑钱系列中的ARPG[spoiler] 虽然官方说正传也是ARPG来着... [/spoiler]，STEAM上很常见的没有日文字幕的日文游戏。

作为外传性质的作品，剧情方面最好的接受方法就是不要带着脑子看，看到什么是什么就好，这样看看的话剧情还是很有意思的，对话里玩梗也依然玩的很欢。虽然是僵尸题材的，但整个剧情一直透着一股欢脱的气氛。

至于剧情的阅读，3DM有汉化补丁，不过不知是不是我一个人的问题，剧情里有两处会跳出，要卸载补丁才能过。

游戏难度方面一如既往的随意，前几章随便打打就过了，后面几章随便打打就被打死了...——不，实际上后几章也挺简单的，只是有那么几个关卡要难打一些，会出现“前一关千辛万苦，后一关毫不费力”的情况，至于剧情的最终BOSS...恕我直言，能在屁股后面做人的都不叫怪。

[strike] 不过以上都不是这款游戏的重点，反正能看到萌妹子、听到各位声优的声音，萌豚们就没有怨言了（笑） [/strike]

[spoiler] 顺带不知道会不会更新爆衣补丁呢 [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198276871649', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1555621211}
review:
The Neptunia Games have always been a matter of whether you love the games or just straight up hate them. I'm more in the middle but that's for another topic.

Let's get this review out of the way: How did this game came to be you may ask? Simple answer - take Hyperdimesion Neptuina U, give a zombie makeover with a zombie story, add the schoolgirl genre because it wouldn't be Japanese enough right and take everything that made U fun and throw it all away and you get this. A fast paced hack and slash that's quite slow to be honest especially compared to Senran Kagura and Hyperdimension Neptunia U which are much faster paced and are actually fun to play. 

The story is about as ordinary as any zombie based story is: the school is infested with zombies(it's actually a play but who's paying attention to this badly written story)and it's up to the Neptunia Cast to stop them(Loose sense of the word). And that's where all the problems begin - the zombie thing has been done to death(pun intended)by the Western World to the point all you need is zombies and BAM! Instant money(coughcough The Walking Dead coughcough). So the makers of this game(must be on something high)thought they can input their ideas into the genre and added the most cliche thing ever: schoolgirls(because it wouldn't be Japanese if it didn't have them). The game has crashing problems when changing the screen size or just changing the screen to full size which is retarded as hell. The story is a snooze and the shop menu(for buying weapons, why am I telling you this, no idea)doesn't work and does this freezy thing(music plays in the background but you can't see anything!!!)causes a crash where the game sorta hits a freezy moment until you press B(I use a gamepad. Obvious reasons)

They took the one thing that made U slighty more interesting: the clothing break system. Thats bad when you consider it's made by the same people who did U and Senran Kagura Shinovi Versus. Sucks when you think about huh?

Through and through the game isn't as bad as the haters say but it's too far from good like the supporters of the Series say it is. You can definitely find a better game out there, so keep looking and pass on this title.

P:S - I loved Neptunia U and I really wanted to love this one too because I have a love/hate relationship with the Main Series because they're turn-based and I'm not a fan of turn-based combat. But I really can't recommend this even to the diehard fans. If you have to get this game, get it for the PS Vita. You'll thank me by not getting it's crappy PC Port(which seems to be the trend for PC Games made this year: all of them are crappy)

*Breathes out.* Finally. That's over. Peace!

author: {'steamid': '76561198170103289', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 849, 'last_played': 1480389931}
review:
This game is a nep game. Not much else to say. its fun. and the character interactions are great. I have not played HDN:U so i cannot compare the two but the gameplay in this game is Sub - Par. its not great but not so horribly dull that you will want to stop playing. Leveling up and building your character feels great, though i kinda just leveled up one character... by the time i got what i wanted i was already op with nep... in short singleplayer is gud, is fun, gud game. now most people (including me and my friend) saw the coop part of this game and thought. Yes. The coop is, well, not boring, but not the best, if your wondering no you cannot play through the story in coop. Instead you go through a series of missions varying in difficulty. and i have to say... they are really easy, like, wow... though to be honest the whole game easy. connectivity is a problem sometimes to, occasionaly we wont be able to connect to one another for no reason but i didnt expect better. Overall i give it Nep/Nep if you adore the interactions between characters of gamindustri this game is for you, if your looking for a ARPG with coop, this is not the game for you. im not good with reviews, but i enjoyed the game.


Side Note: DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU DONT HAVE A CONTROLLER

author: {'steamid': '76561198128707086', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2328, 'last_played': 1571396755}
review:
เกมนี้ไม่เหมือนภาคU ต่อให้ระบบจะเป็นแอคชั่นเหมือนกันแถมก็มีระบบมัลติเพลย์กับบอสมากมาย แต่เนื้อเรื่องและวิธีการเล่นมันต่างกันนิดหน่อย

เพราะภาคU มันคือการเคลียร์ไอน์แครด :D ส่วนภาคนี้มันคือการกำจัดโปเกมอนให้ครบทุกตัว :D

เนื้อเรื่องก็ต่างกัน ภาพก็ต่างกัน แต่เพราะภาคนี้ต่อยอดมาจากภาค U ก็เลยดูดีกว่า แต่ถ้าให้ดีก็อุดหนุนเกมภาคนี้คู่กับภาคU ไปเลย จะได้รู้ความแตกต่างและสามารถนำไปเปรียบเทียบได้อย่างเหมาะสม ไม่ใช่เห็นด้วยตามคนอื่นโดยไม่คิดอะไรเลย

สัมผัสด้วยตัวเองแล้วจะรู้ :D

review: 缺点画面有点差，要和和艹猫一个花质再加点价格还是没问题的。然后是不支持21：9，全屏切桌面有点慢，还好我显示器大游戏又碰巧不支持21：9全屏所以我就用窗口了其实倒也没什么影响，但是对于普通玩家来说或许有点难受。玩起来感觉还行，至少不是摸一下就不想动的游戏，另外虽然也买了不少日呆不过全部都没有打开过...完全跟风其实并不喜欢，但这款ACT还是有硬汉喜欢的元素在里面的。有萌妹又能连击爽还要什么自行车

author: {'steamid': '76561198209637219', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 404, 'last_played': 1489740208}
review:
不打折的话有点贵，大概一半的价格要靠信仰
剧情还是比较有意思的，次元社知名萌豚相声系列，海王星系列主要人物基本上都出场了
镜头自动旋转很慢，基本上都要自己旋转，操作起来比较麻烦
拍照系统很赞，战斗过程中随时可以暂停，转换各种角度拍照
bug意外地不多
最后，dlc非常坑

review:
This game really deserves the "Most bugs fixed with updates" award.
Without changelogs it is actually hard to tell which bugs.
I was able to actually find that one crash bug was actually fixed(when searching for lobbies with password set to "Any")

Aside from that, this game is a good time waster. You come home braindead, call a friend: "hey, let's nep!".
And then you play this game with blank mind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107851282', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1026, 'last_played': 1506806336}
review:
Perhaps this game will suit only the true fans of the game series Neptuia,as the game itself is rather monotonous and get bored.But for me this game was special because it added multiplayer,it really is possible to have fun with friends.Will list the pros and cons of this game.
+Interesting idea about the zombie.
+Added new characters,which was not in the game Hyperdimension Neptunia Action Unleashed:Plutia(Iris Heart),Peashy(Yellow Heart),Uzume(Orange Heart),and Tamsoft.
+Multiplayer.
+Nice atmosphere.
Now the cons.
-Uncomfortable camera.
And perhaps all I am mostly satisfied with the game.
Why I'm not talking about the graphics?Just because I don't like to judge a game because of the graphics,for me gameplay is important.
My rating 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020438964', 'num_games_owned': 474, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 640, 'last_played': 1477607874}
review: Ahhh, console video games (or vidcons as I call them), the ultimate medium of expression, able to convey any emotion from hatred to love, loyalty to fear, all in front of your eyes. Ah, and with lovingly crafted art, music, and the ability to control the action, vidcons are the ultimate combination of the high arts. While I tend to play the stoic, I will be the first to admit that vidcons have driven me to cry, to scream and shout, to feel actual hate; such is the power of this force beyond our wildest reckoning. And here I am, before you, to tempt your tongues with the taint of such a tantalizing topic. And the Japanese, the true geniuses behind the world of video games. Pah, I throw my scorn upon such incompetents of the West who would mock the true art of the Japanese with "games" such as Baldur's Gate and Madden. Perhaps the West is not as intelligent as the East, but this is a matter for another day. Japan has given us such masterpieces as the Final Fantasy series, Star Ocean, Wild Arms, and of course, Arc the Lad. Yes, some of the finest vidcons in the world were created by the Japanese. I come to you today to ask you in all earnesty, what is your favorite vidcon? I will reveal mine after the grand debate has illustriously begun, but not before the first poster falls victim to my plot of discussion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196633890', 'num_games_owned': 546, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1479050716}
review:
基本就是看剧情妹子卖萌的游戏
系统搞得有点复杂，什么支援百合技变身……不过基本也就是无脑搓手柄滚键盘，攒条子放技能，然后偌大的场景形同虚设
而且比起U来没有爆衣，U的爆衣，比你们高到不知道哪里去了，我感觉你们还要学习一个
优点大概是可联机，以及没有DLC地狱，不过那么没玩头的游戏联机也没什么意思啊……
但是你说海王星我支不支持，我当然支持。

author: {'steamid': '76561198123236969', 'num_games_owned': 3530, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 831, 'last_played': 1478711717}
review:
MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies - Це спін-офф популярної серії ігор про богинь-ЦП. В якій дівчата попадають до світу людей і щоб ви думали, вступають в звичайну школу щоб краще пізнати культуру і звичаї людського виду, але стається лихо і школу хочуть закрити за непопулярність, тут нашим героїням приходить в голову зняти кіно-жахастик з зомбі щоб прорекламувати свою школу. Ідея наче хороша, але під час зйомок на школу нападають справжні зомбаки, що стає в пригоді нашим героїням, вони вирішують їх використовувати при зйомках свого фільму =)
Сюжет доволі простий і не надто довгий, але має декілька цікавих поворотів. А головне діалоги справді веселі, Це звісно порівняння, сатира і висміювання, але дуже часто справді влучно =)

Відносно основної серії ігор тут є декілька змін, по-перше геймплейно це не покрокова стратегія, а скоріше слешер. По-друге в грі є мережевий кооператив, ну і звісно головним протагоністом цього разу буде Бланк, хоча Неп йде відразу поруч =)

Графічно гра не отримала ніяких покращень що до інших ігор серії, хоча до переваг можна занести багато нових моделей монстрів, а в цілому все стандартно - доволі скромні локації, і чудові моделі персонажів під час діалогів.

В плані звуку хочеться виділити, що тепер в грі озвучені всі (наче) діалоги, частково це пояснюється меншою кількістю цих самих діалогів, але тим не менше така тенденція не може не тішити. Звісно з нами всі чудові голоси з попередніх ігор, так само як і японські звукові доріжки оригіналу, для фанатів читати субтитри =)

Як я вже казав геймплейно гра є скоріше екшн слешером, в якій ми наносимо швидкі атаки котрі можна, а на пізніших етапах гри навіть потрібно, обєднувати в комбінації для ще сильнішого пошкодження, також є супер атаки котрі можна як виконувати самому, так і в кооперативі з друзями, в цілому геймплей доволі простий для освоєння, і доволі цікавий для експерементування, так як персонажів в грі справді багацько (більше 20-ти) і кожен грає по своєму, що дуже урізноманітнює гру.

В цілому, ця гра не претендує на звання найкращої в серії, але завдяки різноманітності персонажів, і веселим діалогам, як і секретним діалогам зможе заставити пройти себе навіть двічі чи більше, а з друзями в кооперативі стане ще цікавішою.

Рекомендую =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198113848693', 'num_games_owned': 1170, 'num_reviews': 347, 'playtime_forever': 2038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2038, 'last_played': 1575429365}
review:
[h1]Comentario Robótico-Analítico: "MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies"[/h1]

Toda la profundidad de este título radica en la customización, y su encanto es propio del carisma de la franquicia; Más allá de eso, este juego no es particularmente bueno ni recomendable.

Los escenarios son muy grandes pero carecen de detalle, el combate es tan básico como lo esperable de un Hack'n Slash de Neptunia y los bosses se manejan con patrones muy sencillos de comprender y vencer.

No cuenta con muchos puntos positivos, como ya dije antes una de sus virtudes es el encanto de la franquicia y sus personajes. Ser un juego de Neptunia es su mayor virtud y aunque tampoco lo llamaría un mal juego, amerita la inexistente opción de "[b]Recomendación Intermedia[/b]" que a Steam le hace falta.

Cuanto menos es divertido y permite desconectar la cabeza un rato.

[b]¿En conclusión?[/b] Nada del otro mundo. Solamente recomendable para fanáticos de la franquicia o gente que interesada en ésta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048980407', 'num_games_owned': 2513, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1478037780}
review:
[h1]Entering the Nepiverse[/h1]

Going into MegaTagmension (MT) as a newcomer to the Neptunia series, I was thinking that I would be playing some sort of visual novel with hyper-sexualized content under a metaphorical cloak of story progression. Or maybe something with such prolific fan service that I'd have to worry about someone walking in through the door. Little did I know that I was getting myself thrust into a world bathed in 14 different flavors of cuteness. Maybe I've been playing way too many outlandish anime games, but this VN fused with action elements managed to show such a refreshing sense of originality and style that I couldn't help but swoon at its characters. At its core, MT is a fully voiced VN with a little bit of beat em up/hack & slash thrown in, not too dissimilar to the Dynasty Warriors/Musou series. These battle sequences are relatively short and aim to enhance the story's sense of credibility, but ultimately plays a backseat role in expanding Idea Factory’s Neptunia universe.

In this newest release, a small band of girls who seemingly represent their entire academic population are uniting to save their school, Gamicademi, from closing down. In the opening scene, Blanc overhears her sisters being attacked by ghoulish zombies. To her surprise, the zombies are actually actors cast by Neptune in an effort to create a high profile movie with the hopes that it'll be the school's saving grace. Naturally, Blanc decides to join in on the fun and direct the movie herself; however, in a rather ludicrous turn of events real zombies end up getting involved, even if they are neglected between shoots. It is now up to these heavily equipped Powerpuffs to make sure Gamicademi lives to see its grand return to the spotlight.

[h1]MegaTag-Teaming[/h1]

Now saving Gamicademi may be of the utmost importance to Blanc, but some part of me did not allow myself to proceed without first changing all of the girls' outfits to their torn counterparts… Moving on, I began to notice important personalization options other than cute costumes and accessories. Japanese and English voice options are available, to my surprise, helping me solidify my stance to support the original dubbing. For the non-purists out there, the English VAs are actually much better than the average folk employed in domestic dubs, and I even found it to be less cringy and sensual than usual. Either way, I definitely liked the ability to pick audio languages, and feel a need to commend whoever was responsible for that decision. Delving further, MT also lets players have a choice in who they cast for each scene event or fight. This ends up creating "alternate cuts" depending on who you cast, as the resulting scene's dialogue and special events system follow your decisions to an extent. This responsibility puts you in Blanc's shoes, creating the story direction of your choosing in a much more immersive manner.

Regarding MT's Warriors/Musou-like combat system, various aspects regarding its design makes it to be the weakest mechanic of the game. Really poor camera tracking impedes fluid movement and makes positioning more difficult than it should be. Worse is when there is a boss around that can fly and perform diving maneuvers, compounding to create a slightly debilitating combat experience. Furthermore, most of these battle sequences will be completed within a handful of minutes, requiring very little variability to overcome. As the game progresses, combat ever so slowly feels like tedious exercises in mindless button mashing. It’s a big shame since advanced maneuvers are incorporated, such as taking advantage of animation cancelling, invincibility frames, or aerial combo strings for evasion, but they aren’t necessary at all to beat the game. MT's tag-team mechanics, plentiful amount of unlockable combos, and visually appealing SP/EXE Drive skills help make up for the combat's grievances and keep these portions slightly enjoyable, just much less than ideal. 

MT’s combat oriented multiplayer aspect seems to be the game’s biggest wow-factor when comparing it to other Nep titles, as MT is the only game so far to contain such a system. The ability to group up with 3 other players online in a mode featuring new enemies, bosses, arenas, and VN events not seen in the campaign, add major play value. There are tons of quests separated by Star difficulty, providing rewards and experience to level up character stats that carry over to the story mode. Also, unlike story mode, the multiplayer aspect unlocks every character and transformation from the beginning for use, along with changing some of the combat controls to incorporate online player joint attacks. Strangely, I found the multiplayer mode really enjoyable, even while playing solo along with the fact that the multiplayer combat system is the same as the story mode’s system. It’s most likely attributed to the lengthier and tougher quest challenges, unimpeded by tiny segments of dialogue. Unfortunately, MT’s multiplayer mode seems to have been plagued with connection issues for many players ever since launch, but since I haven’t seen any such problems myself, the only experience I have in multiplayer is a fairly positive one.

[h1]Complete Walkthrough Playlist[/h1]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tfeYOnddkgk&index=2&list=PLeavCsRFiP55DgIS7mFpBKiRL5C7RXB9u 

[h1]Verdict[/h1]

Although the story was a bit absurd, it seems to be what defines the style of the Neptunia games. Plenty of funny jabs at the girls’ own ridiculous situations closely flirt around breaking the fourth wall creating a neat sense of relatability, and Blanc’s “extortion” scheme in obtaining MagiGirl Idol’s support is comically hilarious. What started off strong ended up petering out throughout the second half of the game, as the story essentially kept walking around in circles without introducing any real major changes. A new character here or there with a backstory blended in with something zombie related is the extent of MT’s narrative. It’s a bit of a shame since the game is much shorter than its RPG sister titles; so stretching MT’s story thin is pretty problematic. Worse is the alternating nature of the VN and battle sequences. When you get involved with the VN’s story, you’re forced to fight 2 minute battles, just to watch a 2 minute dialogue and repeat the process (up to four or five times in one scene with multiple loading screens for each transition). It’s hard to get attached to either aspect when the game switches gears so often. 

Regardless, as a casual fan of anime and visual novels, I didn't find the newest installment in the Neptunia series too eccentric to take in, or alienating as an entry point. There weren't too many inside jokes or references, and the iconic song and dance summarizing previous important world aspects is present. After wrapping things up with Blanc and friends, I still found myself wanting to delve more into their world, especially as I only seemed to have observed them in such a confined environment. If you are a long-time Neptunia fan, I’m afraid that my verdict may not be very enlightening or relatable from my perspective. Just know that MT is much, much, shorter than the main series games. But for those that are weary of this as an entry point into the series, I can say that MT seemed to be rather welcoming, and is definitely enjoyable as a VN experience all on its own. There is a desire for improvements in the combat realm, but the multiplayer and VN aspects proved to be commendable enough to make checking out MT, or at least other Neptunia games, rewarding, especially during one of Idea Factory’s deep publisher sales.

[table][tr][td]Press copy provided by Idea Factory International, Inc.[/td][/tr][/table]

[table][tr][td][url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/BeforeYouBuy]Before You Buy[/url] – analyses of newly released indie games[/td][/tr][/table]

author: {'steamid': '76561198262496475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1286, 'last_played': 1534890068}
review:
read and decide for yourself.

So, what is this game? A hack'em slash'em with neptunia characters. HDN:U with Multiplayer. That's the gist of it. It Plays a bit more like Senran Kagura Shinovi Versus than U, as the game will spawn it's enemies only from spawn points close to you, and despawn them if you go too far from them. Unlike the "Follow the Path" of SK, or the "Continue on the only obvious path"/"stay in the small arena killing things until the objective is completed" of U, most of the time you go on maps hunting for bosses, who are even denoted on your minimap!

Now, for the enemies changed from U:

Aztec Golems have a jump attack, and are more aggressive.
Kupokitties are less hyperactive.
No robot enemies
Zombies that throw their head as boomerangs
"Flying disco zombies" that shoot hellfire rockets at you, very slowly.
New Large bosses:
-Temdinkale is a one-handed sword fighter with okay mobility and a fun to fight moveset
-Megadonkale is a red dual-wielder with TONS of mobility, a pain to melee, since even his dodges damage you
-Doomkale wields a hammer, is slow as hell, and is badass.
-Undead Cannoneer lugs around two huge guns, and has spectral gauntlets to slap you around with in close range.
-the two Mariwogus-types are large fenrir-type dogs with launchable frisbee weapons, four per doggy. They have high mobility.
-Truenail and it's clone type are big walking birds with a glowy tail ending in a christmas tree light.

Unlike Nep U, you no longer map your skills to specific buttons, but instead always have four skills available.

Like Nep U, and SK, the camera control is abysmal, and needs a specific autohotkey script to be convenient with a mouse.

The multiplayer is a pathetic joke, no real communication (no chat, there is picking up phrases from a phrasebook), no real steam integration, dead game is dead tier lobbies, few games, often someone's either playing with a low-level character who dies in two hits, or a high level murdermachine kitted out in invincibility patches, high def, keep patch, life steal patch, who can steamroll bosses without thinking... Best of all, enemies scale up in HP and Damage with more players, so playing solo mp is easier. Go figure!

And as usual with IF, the game is a buggy wreck. It can lock up when looking for multiplayer servers, it can lock up before the menu, it WILL lock up (not responding) if any application asks for permission to change things in the computer.

The missions are no brainers in story mode, loading times are large.

So all in all I can't wholeheartedly recommend this game. Get it if you are interested in playing with one character or another (I've come for plutia, and you know how she doesn't leave anyone until she's satisfied :D ), get it if it's in the bargain bin, don't get it for full price.

And if you really need some action hack'em slash'em and you haven't played diablo 2 yet, do yourself a favor and get that game. For two thirds of the price you get the base game and the expansion. The ability to play in either classic mode or expansion mode, which are two wholly different experiences. Deep itemization and high amount of character customization allow you to play the way you want (Aside from a few caveats). Battle.net is a wonderful place to be (if you can avoid the bots) and you can even activate the Perfect Gem! (sorry, inside joke)

author: {'steamid': '76561198117208868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1484, 'last_played': 1558159081}
review:
Otro juego de nep.... con Blanc como protagonista, justo lo que quería... (claro que no)
en mi opinion no esperaba mucho de este juego más que probar su multiplayer y quejarme o algo así... hasta que las primeras 2 escenas terminaron y cambie mi parecer:

Pros.... o cosas chidas OP:[list]
[*]Le pusieron customizacion [b]totalmente libre[/b] a los personajes, lo cual me dio un buen punto de vista sobre el desarrollamiento del juego. Eso si para este editarlo de manera que te guste como se ve, requieres de un poco de tiempo
[*]Un nuevo sistema de conseguir skills, armas, y procesadores interesantes. Adios medallas!!
[*]Quitaron items de recuperacion durante los combates pero los skills de sp se recargan así que bien
[*]La obtencion de eventos y su multiplayer adaptado bien de cierta manera
[*]Para los que amaban el ecchi del U les dejaron las ropas destruidas de ese titulo
[*]Adicion de nuevos personajes de la saga (Sigo esperando uno donde salga mages)
[*]Tiene un nuevo sistema para combatir, muy diferente del U

Conter.... digo contras:
[*]El UI/menú de pausado durante el juego, este tiende a ser molesto de usar en el juego aunque añade bien el chat durante este
[*]Las partes del dark history sería bueno si las pudiese colocar a mi manera o almenos mezclarlo como en los otros titulos 
[*]Igual que todo hack and slash una vez aprendido el patron de ataque de los enemigos, el juego se vuelve facil... aunque en este a diferencia del U los enemigos no "avisan" sus ataques

No sé que más decir, probablemente me faltó algo y si es así lo añadire despues....
mi calificación sería 8/10
Seguiré esperando un local co-op para pc XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198261615234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 6880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6066, 'last_played': 1566387537}
review:
1   追着画风和联机模式来的，开房间不设密码，不认识的大神不请自来，我和朋友也自觉地张开双手抱上了白白嫩嫩的大腿，两个小时打下来如同坐火箭一般，迅速攻略大型boss, 基本上大神负责输出以及充当救死扶伤的华佗，我负责死，真躺赢啊有木有！！游戏就是要这么互（姬）相（情）帮（满）助（满），单机主线剧情丰富，欢快，可用来熟悉各角色操作，画质我调1920*1080 ，流畅度方面还好本人14年的超极本也能流畅运行。目前正在物色哪个角色最强，然后想把她等级练到最高
2   汉化补丁我用的三大妈基于PSV版官方中文文本制作 补翻新增文本，除第八章最后一节与十二章会有问题其他没有，出问题的用汉化补丁程序还原英文，下一节再汉化回去就可以了。
3 窗口化与无边框可以避免一些问题，输入法英文。
4 部分人挺容易出现闪退，原因不明

author: {'steamid': '76561197995577440', 'num_games_owned': 290, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 1776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1712, 'last_played': 1543464289}
review:
Finally the game is fixed (mostly) from all the awful game-breaking issues it had upon release

Now the game works well i have to say im really enjoying the online mode but really wish that there were more choice for it battle wise. I know this is a vita port but i just wish that the game had more big boss monsters for the team to fight in online-mode. While what we have is good i just feel more could have been added.

Story mode is ok but honstly i find myself gettimg tired of this one for some reason (story mode i mean) im not sure if its just the silly plot or the fact im playing the game mostly on friday night around midnight as i work all week from 6am till around 4 in the afternoon and then just sleep what time i have off till friday comes..........actually yeah its probably that part 

Its a good game but i recommend getting it off ebay and steam is (as always) asking to much even on there so-called sales

author: {'steamid': '76561198292245609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1610, 'last_played': 1478158320}
review:
[最最近更新]海王星无关，我只是想说，不要再骂地雷社pc没有中文了，因为马上就有了。
中文君：所以说人生就是不可预料，我就想不明白，我一个各个日厂移植游戏都会忘掉的语种，怎么就能明年春天和英日来个三合一。但是if说了：“上头已经决定了，就要把你加入FFFADF豪华午餐了”，我当时就吟了两句诗给他们……
[最近更新]算起来已经更新了快⑩个版本了吧（或许⑨个？），作为业界公认的萌豚星，能认真平衡游戏这么久也算是用心了吧，可惜全任务完成后后继乏力的问题没有根本上解决。不过这也是游戏题材本身的硬伤，毕竟这一点上单机比不上MMO啊。
话虽如此，诸君，为了你我的waifu，买买买啊！

本作比起U来改变的不是一点点，核心游戏内容不是割草了，连段被限制了，招式和怪物各种梗，增加了LB锁定以后莫名其妙的有了点怪物猎人的味道。
因为不割草了所以难度相对U高了一些，新手以及没有主线RUSH多人的玩家可能会有些不适应，如果觉得打不过还是先左转单人剧情吧。
[h1]单人部分[/h1]
[spoiler]“那些先打多人不管故事的都是什么心态啊，反正……想要白金必须打单人剧情啊”——强迫症晚期玩家
“那些先打多人不管故事的都是什么心态啊，反正……看妹子卖萌果断打单人剧情啊”——绅士玩家[/spoiler]
这次的单人剧情有些无厘头啊= =游戏长度与U没有太大差别，不得不说新次元以后的LIVE2D真是棒极了，剧情嘛又是独立于重生和新次元世界观的，可能是要服务于战斗，显得有些呆板了。
不过瑕不掩玉[strike]有妹子看还瞎BB什么[/strike]还是优秀的。
如之前所言，想快速提升等级最好的办法就是推剧情，强烈推荐新手先进行单人游戏。
[h1]多人[/h1]
本作最大卖点，终于可以和小伙伴一起玩耍[strike]看妹子[/strike]了
[h1]注意，请确保下载时和小伙伴选择了同一地区的服务器！否则无法互联![/h1]
游戏中并没有严重的卡顿现象，体验还是很优秀的。至于其他不再赘述，诸位[spoiler]绅士[/spoiler]自行体验吧。
[h1]怪物[/h1]
总的来讲，这一作你终于不能随心所欲地割草了。
U中后期才出现的肥宅这次贯穿游戏始终，前期攻击力不够想要破除霸体是较难的，[strike]誓死要在极限攻击流一条路上走到黑的[/strike]我被摸两下基本就残了；大众新怪物DQN远程攻击频繁数量又多，原地炮台流可以淡出历史舞台了。具体各位自行体验。
主要说说大怪。
主题怪无比菜鸡，攻击手段贫弱（DIO：ぴんじゃく！ぴんじゃく！）气绝非常容易，屁♂股处全都是破绽……[strike]让人想起了某同样地位的雄火鸡[/strike]
三只机甲个人觉得最难的是双刀的，移动灵活破绽很难找，地面上相对安定的左脚其实也不安全，不过对空安定点很多，各位可以自行摸索。
大剑和大锤各有套路，勤洗脚即可，唯一几个大动作预判好用技能规避掉就是了。
狼的出招变化似乎是最多的，但不同的关卡中攻击方式不同，没什么死角不太好打，恕我无能，除了堆属性刚正面没想到什么办法= =
长的就像只怪鸡的某雌火。IF玩得一手好梗（捂脸）技能基本都是怪猎的那些= =龙车啊吐火球啊空中乱舞啊= =无论有没有怪猎经验，熟手了都不是问题。
最终BOSS给我印象最深的就是他的JOJO立= =伤害都在刀轮上，不要贪刀，角色机动性够就直接贴身猛干。
[h1]原有人物[/h1]
U里就有的人物普遍改动都是一样的，加大了收招后摇，降低了攻击灵活性。[spoiler]老婆[/spoiler]ギア酱变身不能无限转转[strike]键山雏[/strike]了不开心。小天使ロム有了奶，真成牧师了。
当然也有大改，[h1]拉姆·甘道夫[/h1]彻底走上了布大锤第二的不归路，华丽变身近战法爷，还能上BUFF……
[strike]不过也是挺好玩的……[/strike]
[h1]新人物[/h1]
[h1]天王之星·空调うずめ[/h1]
打击感极度强大的角色，主要输出手段是普段蓄力，直拳简单粗暴后摇小伤害还很高，对付大怪很强劲，缺点是普段范围薄弱。
变身小奶音依旧萌，只是伤害不怎么高，所以不推荐变身。感觉这货就是为了多人开发的。
EXE：オラオラオラオラオラオラオラ！！！！！！！！
[h1]TAM·维吉尔[/h1]
当我第一次玩她[spoiler]想歪的全出去面壁[/spoiler]的时候被惊呆了，灵魂剑阎魔刀力量之刃，斯巴达血统太可怕了啊…………
如果玩过鬼泣系列，立马就能看出来技能各种梗。
然而不只是玩梗啊，大攻击范围高伤害，真的很强。
[h1]普露露和皮ko[/h1]
卖萌有余强度不足，不管是哪个世界大锤都对yellow heart充满怨念哈哈哈哈哈awfawkgialjtauitjkajwilt
并不是棍机，虽然普露露真的真的真的真的好萌……
咳咳，总之不推荐新手使用。
[h1]优化[/h1]
优化感人，地雷社你哪里来的黑科技= =五年老电脑稳定60帧，太强了。


评分 NEP/NEP
还用说么，海王星肯定好评



今天终于白金了= = 最后再吐槽一下部位破坏，没有明说而且破了不掉素材只有僵直，感觉没有很大意义。
所以说唯一的价值就是倍数计算伤害方便速刷了？

author: {'steamid': '76561198086183753', 'num_games_owned': 849, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1700796796}
review:
Amazing on the Vita, an absolute NIGHTMARE on the PC. Worst port I've ever seen in my entire life. This even beats Tales of Symphonia by a mile for "worst port on Steam".

The only gameplay I get is some soundless dialogue, 1 second of background music, and a crash. No matter what mode I choose. This is unavoidable. I cannot play the actual game with my friends. They won't be expecting my money for a Victory II port if this isn't patched, because this is the most ridiculous thing. I'm way over minimum specs, so no issues there. However, with this and all of the other bugs, this is definitely not Steam ready. I don't know what the heck the beta team was thinking when they gave it an all-clear.

-1/10. Needs more sound in the main menu mini-game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013410553', 'num_games_owned': 909, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1159, 'last_played': 1475925449}
review:
К сожалению, steam предоставляет очень маленький объём для написания текста, поэтому здесь я ограничусь фрагментом. Кому интересна полная версия обзора, с плюсами, минусами и скриншотами по каждой части серии, прошу сюда: http://stopgame.ru/blogs/topic/76077
Помните, что любая оценка и любой обзор это чьё-то субъективное мнение/впечатление. Прошу не кидаться кака шками (да что нецензурного в этом слове? :) ), если кто-то со мной не согласен. Я готов к (и даже рад) конструктивному диалогу.
_____
Несмотря на то, что я ставлю палец вверх, я остался недоволен приобретенной игрой. Да, это по прежнему Нептуния, но, покупая игры этой серии, я всегда считал, что обеспечиваю себя геймплеем на 40-80 часов. Эту игру я прошел за 8, выполнив все квесты на максимальный ранг. Еще 11 ушло на фарм уровней, эвентов, предметов и т.д.. И того 19 часов. Игра просто прошлась и забылась, к сожалению. Сюжет у нее понравится далеко не каждому, ибо он изначально слишком комедиен, чтоли. Я бы сказал глуп. Вокруг вроде как реальный зомби апокаллипсис, а они кино снимают... Геймплейно игра тоже проста, что подтверждают те самые 8 часов. Абсолютно никакого челленджа, вы просто берете любого персонажа и идете им по сюжету до конца игры. Вам не придется беспокоиться о способностях, экипировке, пассивных скиллах и прочем.
Тем не менее, почему я рекомендую купить эту игру. Полагаю, раз вы зашли сюда, на страницу седьмой игры серии Hyperdimension Neptunia, вы являетесь поклонником серии. Как мы знаем, иногда, чтобы увидеть Valiant Hearts и Child of Light, нужно купить парочку Ассасинов и Фар Краев. Вот здесь то же самое. Я готов купить порт простенькой игры с портативной консоли, если это ускорит появление новой части теперь уже одной из моих любимых игровых серий.
_____
Оценка: 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198087565261', 'num_games_owned': 860, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 1168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1146, 'last_played': 1481310798}
review:
กลับมาอีกครั้งสำหรับ Spin-off แนวฟันแหลกของซีรีย์เทพธิดาแห่งโลกเกม HyperDimension Neptunia โดยได้ทีมงาน TamSoft ผู้ที่เคยฝากผลงานอย่างซีรีย์ Senran Kagura และ Onechanbara  รวมไปถึง Spin-off ซีรีย์เนปภาค U: Action Unleashed ที่เคยลงสตีมเมื่อต้นปีที่ผ่านมา เป็นผู้พัฒนาตัวเกม โดยจับนำตัวละครหลักๆ จากซีรีย์เนปมากระทืบเหล่า(มอนเตอร์)ซอมบี้ ณ โรงเรียน ม.ปลาย แห่งหนึ่ง เพื่อทำหนังของพวกแม่นางนั่นเอง

ระบบภาคนี้จะเป็นการนำภาค U มาปรับปรุงระบบต่างๆ ให้ดีขึ้น (เรียกง่ายๆ คือ Nep U 2.0) ตั้งแต่ระบบการต่อสู้ที่ลื่นไหลขึ้น โหมดเนื้อเรื่องที่ยาวขึ้น(นิดนึง) และเพิ่มโหมด Co-op กับเพื่อนอีก 3 คน ตะลุยเควสล่ามอนเตอร์และบอสในดันเจี้ยนต่างๆ ด้วยตัวละครที่ท่านรัก ในส่วนของเรื่องการอัพเลเวลตัวละครในภาคนี้ ได้เปลี่ยนให้ผู้เล่นอัพค่าพลังต่างๆ ได้ตามใจชอบ ตามที่มีค่า AP เหลืออยู่ ซึ่งจะได้ทุกครั้งเมื่ออัพเลเวล แทนจากการที่เกมอัพค่าพลังให้ตามเลเวลที่เพิ่มขึ้นเหมือนภาคก่อน และในโหมดเนื้อเรื่อง เหตุการณ์บางฉากจะเปลี่ยนไปจากปกติ ขึ้นอยู่กับตัวละครที่ผู้เล่นเลือกด้วย

ส่วนที่ติในภาคนี้หลักๆ คือ ในเรื่องของความยาก-ง่าย ช่วงต้นๆ เกมยังมีความยากอยู่บ้าง แต่พอเล่นไปได้ซักพักจนตัวละครเลเวลสูงระดับหนึ่ง คุณจะสามารถลุยโหมด Co-op ได้ด้วยตัวคนเดียวทุกมิชชั่น โดยที่บอสจะทำอะไรคุณแทบไม่ได้เลย (ยกเว้นบอสบางตัวที่ดาเมจใส่คุณได้อยู่) และเรื่องของบั๊กสำหรับโหมด Co-op ที่หลายๆ คนเจอ เช่น เข้าหาห้องแล้วเกมเด้งหลุดเอง บลาๆๆ ยังคงต้องรอให้ทีมงานแก้ไขแพทช์ตัวเกมต่อไป

หากใครเป็นแฟนซีรีย์เนป หรือคุณไม่ใช่แฟนซีรีย์นี้และไม่เคยเล่นมาก่อน ก็ลองดูได้ เล่นง่ายๆ สบายๆ ก็ลองดูได้ ถึงคุณจะไม่ใช่แฟนซีรีย์นี้มาตั้งแต่แรก หากคุณได้ลองสัมผัสดู คุณอาจจะหลงรักตัวละครในซีรีย์นี้ขึ้นมาก็ได้ครับ

+ ตัวเกมเข้าถึงได้ง่าย ไม่ซับซ้อน
+ ความน่ารัก สดใสของตัวละครบวกกับเสียงพากย์ JP ที่ชวนหลงไหล
+ โหมด Co-op รองรับการเล่นกับเพื่อนได้ถึง 4 คน
+ การควบคุมที่ลื่นไหล สามารถปรับเปลี่ยนปุ่มบังคับได้ตามสะดวก (แนะนำให้เล่นด้วยจอยครับเกมนี้)
- ระบบล๊อกเป้าศัตรูที่ทำมามึนๆ งงๆ ชอบล๊อกเป้าตัวลูกน้องมากกว่าตัวบอส
- ความยากง่ายของเกมที่ไม่สมดุลกัน
- บั๊กบางส่วนที่ยังมีอยู่บนตัวเกมเวอร์ชั่นพอร์ต

author: {'steamid': '76561198176743546', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 2035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1573, 'last_played': 1489103356}
review:
Megatagmension Blanc + Neptune vs Zombies! ...or you can just call it Hyperdimension Blanc U

Completed 100% Achievement in 26 hours
Well, compared to other Neptunia games, that's pretty fast...

Okay, let's review this game compared to Hyperdimension Neptunia U 
Pros :
+ Moar characters! (Hell yeah Uzume!)
+ Multiplayer! (But I don't have any friends so I just use it to complete the achievements... *cry*)
+ New Art Style! (Not exactly new, but this game use Megadimension art style which is compared to Nep U is... new)
+ CPUs in School Life! (More precisely, CLUB Life)
+ Better Port! (I think.... isn't it?)
+ Menu Voices! (Finally, someone who miss me when I'm gone)
+ Less Cancer Achievements! (Finally no "ALL LILY RANK MAXED" Hell yeah!)
+ Better Equipment Setup! (We can add patches update, dark history part and accesories)
+ Yuri Sniper Uni and Magical Noirina (THE BEST PROS )
Cons :
- Multiplayer is still buggy, we can't see if the room is currenly Playing or Waiting, and region locked
- Cringest Movie Ever!
- Cancer text font from Nep U is back!
- Short, but hey we can still enjoy the buggy multiplayer, can't we?
Not sure whether it's good or bad :
? No Costume Break.... Less fanservice is good....isn't it?

Well overall this game is good and fun. It runs faster and smoother than Nep U. If you like Nep U, you'll like this one...even if you don't have friends to play with....trustme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058742831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1482984249}
review:
Ready for a second serving of Neptunia and Tamsoft? Idea Factory's ready to serve you more with MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies (what a mouthful!)!
This is a spiritual successor to Hyperdimension Neptunia U Action Unleashed, but this time, you're brought to the Light Novel universe known as Gamicademi, where you take control of schoolgirls fighting zombies. Yep, schoolgirls, zombies, AND Neptunia, an epic casserole we have here. Now I'm sure we've all modded Left 4 Dead 2 to include Neptunia characters and go on 4 player zombie slaying havok. This here is the real deal, you're getting the actual Nep girls fighting zombies (which are zombified monsters of Neptunia lore like the Dogoo and Super Otaku).
Just like Neptunia U, the story is rather silly, but it's a lot more interesting as it progresses. The story is that Gamicademi is closing, and as a means of saving the school, the girls must film a movie about their school, and believe it or not, zombies appear and the girls use the opportunity to make a zombie movie featuring their school. Both the movie in the making and the game's story all prove to be very silly and hilarious. It's even funnier when some of the girls go into crazy antics.
Meanwhile the gameplay is a lot like Neptunia U, but the moveset has been nerfed and reworked. The new attacks take time to get used to since now you can charge attacks and in turn makes combo stringing a lot more challenging (good luck getting 9,999 combos). You still have your horde of enemies with dumb AI at least, so they can make things more or less easy. It takes time getting used to the new schemes especially with 14 characters (another 14 with their HDD/transformed state), but it still feels fast paced and easy to pick up and play.
Missions are much shorter as well. As this is a Vita game, this was a perfect way to get your Nep on the go. And if you're using a laptop, then you'll get about the same amount of portablility and accessibility. Now the missions may be shorter, but sometimes they can be difficult especially at lower levels. At least you retain the EXP gained if you die in the apocalypse.
Another thing I like about this game is how you can put accessories in JUST ABOUT ANYWHERE. I repeat, JUST ABOUT ANYWHERE. What is this, Garry's Mod? I can cram two stackable plushies onto the same head, headphones, hats, all in the same spot. Clearly someone wanted this to be the next Hat Simulator since Team Fortress 2.
When you're done playing the singleplayer, you can tackle the game's biggest focus, the multiplayer. It's 4 player hack and slash goodness as you take on various quests like it's Monster Hunter and God Eater. I'm surprised at how stable the game's servers are in my view especially with lag free input (a friend of mine told me Tamsoft makes excellent netcoding and their Steamworks are just as good as the Vita). I sure could use a handy button to invite friends over. There's private servers that you can secure with a password, so it's something. And if you wanted to cross-platforms with Vita, no dice. Just Steam servers. But hey, Multiplayer is very fun.
In the end, this takes a lot of the fun things about Neptunia U and made it quirkier, and more fun to play. It's also zombies and schoolgirls mashed in. It seemed to me that Idea Factory saw how many L4D2 and GMOD players loved playing with Neptunia mods and wanted to make a game of its own. I had a lot of fun playing this game, and since it's the Halloween season, what a perfect time for them to bring this game to Steam. Now if only Uni learned how to do Rule No. 2: Double Tap.

author: {'steamid': '76561198106960803', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1487689589}
review:
Our long-awaited Blanc spinoff is here!

Pros:-

+Blanc!
+Uzume!
+Waifu dress up
+Pretty high FPS, even for a low-end graphics card.
+As with other Neptunia games, it's cute
+Compared to Nep U, it has an RPG-like feel, with a point allocation system
+Multiplayer, which is a first for the Nep series.

Cons:-

-Region-locked multiplay
-Opening sequence can't be skipped
-Opening sequence is stuck in a specific resolution (at least for me)
-Freezes at start if played without WiFI (again, it's probably just me)
-Somewhat lacking in Nep jokes compared to the other games
-You can't friggin move Blanc's hat (tbh annoying as f**k)

Overall: 8/10

So yeah, this game has its bugs, but if you've played the other Neptunia games, you would love it just as much. Be prepared to lose your dignity though (But if you've already played the other games, you would probably have lost most of it already). Enjoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307903608', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1583, 'last_played': 1476754430}
review: This game is a great game! I love the characters and the gameplay. However, the reason why I cannot recommend this game to anyone at the moment is because the online is terrible. Sometimes I try to search for a room aaaaaaaannnnnnd it crashes. Try to join a room? Crashes. Its very frustrating...sometimes when I DO get a chance to play online I get these weird hair glitches that obstruct my view making io hard to find where the enemies are. Another glitch that is really annoying is the "Player joined player left" notification that wont go away until you actually leave the room. Other than that the game is really addicting. You can grind to level 99 relatively easy. I will probably update my review as time goes on. I really hope they fix the multiplayer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120803274', 'num_games_owned': 1669, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1034, 'last_played': 1476460566}
review:
เนป ๆ เวอร์ชันไฮสคูลที่ทุกคนน่ารักขึ้นหมดเลย(ยกเว้นคนนึงที่ดูเหมือนเดิม)
โดยเกมนี้ทำขึ้นมาเพราะ blanc ชนะเลิศผลการโหวต popularity poll ครั้ง 2 ของทาง
compile heart นั่นเอง (ไม่อยากจะเชื่อเลยว่าชาวจอแบนจะเยอะขนาดนี้) ซึ่งตัวละคร
ที่ชนะเลิศจะได้มีเกมที่ตัวเองเป็นตัวหลัก ทำให้ภาคนี้ blanc จะเป็นตัวละครหลักของเกม

ลิงค์ผลการโหวต
http://www.compileheart.com/neptune/vote/result2014/

(blanc คะแนน 40k ทิ้งห่างที่ 2 อย่าง IF ที่ได้ 26k แบบขาดลอย)


ตัวเกมเป็นแบบเดียวกับภาค Nep U คือเป็นแนวลงดัน+ฟันแหลก แต่มีการปรับตัวละคร
ให้ลดความ OP ลง คือในร่าง HDD จะไม่สามารถโจมตีพร้อมกับเคลื่อนไหวอย่างรวดเร็ว
เหมือนภาค Nep U อีกต่อไป ทำให้เราตกเป็นเป้าหมายของศัตรูได้ง่ายขึ้น 
แต่ถึงอย่างนั้น เกมนี้ก็ยังง่ายอยู่ดี 

เกมเน้นไปที่ระบบมัลติเพลเยอร์(MP) แบบ co-op โดยจะมีเควสราว ๆ ครึ่งนึงของทั้งหมด
อยู่ในโหมดนี้ รวมถึง special quest ที่จะเปลี่ยนไปตามวันอีกด้วย
(จันทร์, อังคาร , พุธ...) แต่คุณสามารถเปลี่ยนวันที่บนคอมเพื่อไปทำเควสพวกนี้
ได้โดยไม่ต้องรอเวลาจริง ๆ นอกจากนี้บอสที่ยากที่สุดในเกม
ก็อยู่ในโหมด MP อีกเช่นกัน ดังนั้นถ้าคุณเล่น Story Mode จบแล้ว อย่าเพิ่งคิดว่า
นั่นคือทั้งหมดของเกมนี้ครับ ต้องมาเล่นโหมด MP ด้วย

และไม่ต้องกลัวว่าเกมเน้นโหมด MP แต่ไม่มีเพื่อนเล่นด้วยจะเล่นไม่ได้ครับ เพราะถึงจะเป็น
โหมด MP แต่สามารถเล่นคนเดียวได้ และถ้าคุณอัพเวลจน 99 คุณสามารถเล่นคนเดียว
ไปจนจบทุกฉากได้แบบชิล ๆ (ถ้าเวล 99 จะมีบอสใหญ่ของโหมด MP ตัวเดียวที่ทำคุณเลือดลดได้)

ข้อเสียหลัก ๆ ของเกมก็คือ บั๊คเกมที่ไม่รู้จะแก้เมื่อไหร่ โดยเฉพาะโหมด MP
ที่มีบั๊คที่น่าปวดหัว คือระหว่างที่คุณลงดันในโหมดนี้ หากมีคน join ห้องเข้ามา
คุณจะออกจากดันไม่ได้ ติดแหงกอยู่ในนั้นจนกว่าคนที่ join มาจะกดออกจากห้องไป
ทำให้หากคุณอยากเข้ามาเก็บเควสในโหมด MP คุณจะต้องตั้ง password ห้องเสมอเพื่อกันคนเข้ามา

นอกจากนี้ก็บั๊คเรื่องปรับความละเอียดเป็น 1080p แล้ว เกมจะค้าง+เด้งหลุดโดยไม่มีสาเหตุ
ต้องปรับความละเอียดลดลงถึงจะเล่นได้แบบไม่มีเด้งหลุด

author: {'steamid': '76561198154406329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1379, 'last_played': 1536502915}
review:
第一次接触海王星的ACT题材，可能是习惯了固定式的第三人称，激次元这种自由动的经常瞄不准，像优尼这种远程我根本不会玩。
挺欢乐的一个游戏我一口气把剧情玩通关了，单人感觉有点不够，才爽起来就没了，联机是个好主意可以和其他萌豚一起玩。
果然优尼姬亚好百合，至于NEP嘛……你和布兰这样真的不怕诺瓦露黑化吗
另外就是心痛优尼这样下去真的怕优尼完成9杀。



然后说下这游戏有个大问题！
辣鸡地雷你上PC能不能给WIN8做点优化？！各种按键停止运行我满级了都还拿的初始装备，你知道四个NEP联机就我一个拿着木刀有多尴尬吗？！

author: {'steamid': '76561198130816752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2147, 'last_played': 1491882945}
review:
เอาตามความจริงเลยนะ มันทำให้เราติดเกมนี้จริงๆ ไม่รู้เพราะอะไร มันไม่มีอะไรทำแล้ว แต่ยังเล่นต่อ เพราะเล่นเพลินดี

ข้อดี
1.เล่นเพลินเหมือนภาค U แต่เล่นยากกว่า
2.ทุกคนที่ซื้อเกมนี้เพราะตัวละครน่ารัก 
3.เพราะมีเพื่อนเล่นถึงเล่นได้นาน
ข้อเสีย
1.เข้าห้องเพื่อนยากโคตร เหมือนก่อนนะ แต่ปรับ ดีขึ้นขอข้ามและกัน
คิดข้อเสียไม่ออก จริงๆ 555 เพราะเราเล่นเกมนี้ไม่เป็นอะไรเลย นอกจาก online ถ้าจะให้คะแนนจัดไป 9/10 ความคิดส่วนตัวคนเดียว แล้วแต่คนคิดและกันนะ

author: {'steamid': '76561198142428054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1866, 'last_played': 1481289490}
review:
It's not really that different from Neptunia U so if you liked that game you're surely going to like this too; if you are familiar with the Neptunia franchise and you like their kind of stories you'll probably like this game too for the same reason.
It is that kind of game after all; a musou-styled Neptunia game with their funny stories, lovable character and strangely addicting gameplay.
Now with multiplayer included.
And Blanc as a protagonist.
And Bert as a possible recycle bin.
And Magical No... Nothing. I said nothing.

Pros:
+ The story is funny
+ The characters are awesome as always
+ The general gameplay is fun
+ It has multiplayer now and it was something I really would wanted in the U game
+ They put really a lot of details in the voice chat, there are even catchphrases of the single characters or the unique calling ways they have to each other
+ I... Honestly liked there wasn't the clothing damage system of the U game (But that could be just me...)
+ Uzume ** (But that could be just me...)

Cons:
- That's probably one of the shortest Neptunia game I ever played, probably done this way to add the multiplayer though
- There isn't an extra after played the story (I really liked the Neptral Tower and the Gamindustri Gauntlet of the U)
- Multiplier is present but still a little bit bugged, it's not that easy to connect with other people even though there are servers
- I honestly think the combos in the U game were better thought and more connectible to do combos. (But that could be just me...)

author: {'steamid': '76561198113409461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1492, 'last_played': 1482506105}
review:
ต้องบอกก่อนเลยว่าใครที่เป็นแฟนเกมเนปจูนไม่ควรพลาดภาคนี้

[h1]MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies[/h1]
เป็นเกมที่พัฒนาต่อมาจากภาค U ซึ้งก็ทำได้ดีมากเลย
เนื้อเรื่องไม่มีความเกี่ยวข้องกับภาคใดๆทั้งสิ้นภาคนี้จะมีเนื้อเรื่องเป็นของตัวเอง
ระบบเกมที่มาเพิ่มคือ ระบบ Ranking ไว้เพื่อดูอันดับของตัวเองและเพื่อน
ถึงตัวเกมภาคนี้บางตัวละครนั้น Combo อาจจะไม่ลื่นไหลเหมื่อนภาค U และไม่มีระบบชุดขาด
แต่ภาคนี้มีที่เด็ดอยู่ที
[spoiler] ระบบ Co op ที่สามารถออนไลค์เล่นกับเพื่อนได้สูงสุด 4 คนนั้นเอง[/spoiler]
นอกจากระบบที่เราได้พูดไปข้างต้นมีอีกระบบนึ่งที่สนใจคือการปรับแต่งตัวละครได้นั้นเอง(เราเสียเงินกับของแต่งตัวมากกว่าเสียกับอาวุธซะอีก)
ฟิน=,,,,=

author: {'steamid': '76561198207073739', 'num_games_owned': 476, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1618836395}
review:
MegaTagmenion Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies. A new spin-off game of the Neptunia franchise, based on the same system as Neptunia U and of course develloped by the same team. Just like Noire got her own game, this one has Blanc as a main character, even though Neptune is present throughout the entire game. When will a Vert-only game come out?

But let's now evaluate the game.

The gameplay :

If you have played Nep U and got the mechanics right, it will not be hard to play MegaTagmension, as it is also a Hack-N-Slash. Although, a few changes are visible. The commands are a little bit different, and if you play with a keyboard you might wanna go through the settings to re-assignate some keys. Goodbye to the torn-off duds caused by the monsters, and goodbye to the Nepbull released by monsters. Now, if you wanna heal during battle, you have to buy items and equip them. New ennemies, and a new way to improve your characters using "Ability points" that you gain through leveling. No medals anymore, but instead treasure pieces (in fact consoles) that let you unlock new outfits. You can also by accessories and customize your characters, this can be helpful later. Overall, an easy-to-understand system. Also, if you're used to grinding in the Neptunia games, try not to grind too much. A lvl 70 character won't help you fight the last boss in an epic battle, as you need to be around lvl 40 to beat it. You don't want to kill it too easily.

The Story :

As I said earlier, this game's main protag is Blanc, our Justice goddess (No, Blanc, that was a praise, put that hammer down! ). Our 8 Gamindustri rulers (Yes, I put the Candidates as rulers) have enrolled in Gamicademy, a school situated on an island in the center of Gamindustri, so that anybody from any country can join. They have joined this school to understand humans better and help their people. But when they hear that the academy is gonna close because of a lack of students, Neptune don't hesitate to do anything she can to save it and bring more students. The story itself is pretty entertaining, our 4th-wall breaks are still here and some scenes are an hommage to the community. The time completion may depend on your will to end the game fast or not. For me, it took 8 hours, and I haven't "fully" completed the game as there are some scenes that can only be unlocked via certain conditions (But in-game hints can help you unlock them). A whole lot of characters from the different games, as well as a new character brought by the constant wish of the Devs to put themselves in the game : Tamsoft. The same way IF and Compa represents Idea Factory and Compile Heart (And don't forget our dungeon helper Stella, representing FelliStella), Tamsoft represents... Well, Tamsoft, they didn't bother trying to change the name, which is not completely a bad thing. She's a rather strong character and can become useful in some fights. (She even have a transformation).

The Multiplayer :

Remember earlier, when I told you about customizing your characters? Well, it is mainly because there's a brand-new multiplayer mode, allowing you to take on quests with up to 3 other people. The quests aren't related to the main game, and the Multiplayer has in fact it's own story, and can take some time to complete. You will even be able to play directly with the HDD form of a character, while another player uses it's normal form. (It happened to me, I was playing as Purple Heart while somebody else was playing as Neptune, and we cleared bosses with an excessive amount of Neptune Break). You can choose wether to use a save from the Story mode, keeping your lvls, or you can start with a brand-new save only for Multiplayer and work your way from lvl 1 to lvl 99.

Issues :

I have only noticed a few issues :
-Whenever I start the game, I have to wait 5-10 minutes before reaching the main menu. I suspect this is because I don't have the perfect configuration.
-Sometimes, in multiplayer, people might try to join while you're doing a quest, which may results in endlees loops of : <Player> has joined, <Player> has left, <Player> has joined, <Player> has left, etc...

So this concludes my review of this game. A rather good spin-off that doesn't deviate from the franchise, a good story, a good gameplay and very few issues. For me, I give this game a 9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198027037126', 'num_games_owned': 3383, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 1276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1476948283}
review:

游戏好评，虽然存在操作上各种恶心人，不过爽快感十足，而且现在联机人好像挺多的，不停的有人加房间2333

author: {'steamid': '76561198020798482', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 571, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1524931261}
review:
I would love to recommend this because I am a big fan of the franchise, but unfortunately I cannot do that, not for the full price at least.

MegaTagmension is a musou style game (like Dynasty Warriors) while the promise and potential is good, the problem is that the whole game consists of very short scenes in which you fight just 1 pack of monsters. The most gameplay you will get in a row is about 3 minutes.  This is NOT a game in which you traverse large levels with monster packs, bosses, complete objectives etc. You load the scene, kill 20 mobs, and that's it. I haven't completed it yet, but the whole thing can probably be completed in about 3-4 hours tops. Of course there is some replayability thanks to leveling, lily ranks, treasures gathering and such.

Most of the time is spent in menus and reading dialogue cutscenes, which are funny and interesting as always in the Neptunia games, but when you have to spend 5 minutes reading dialogues to get 2 minutes of action it kind of kills the fun.

If you are a hardcore Neptunia fan, it will still be fun of course. Though I would suggest waiting for a sale. This game just isn't worth 30€.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062939900', 'num_games_owned': 392, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1581168814}
review:
首先说的是：我买首发的，却现在开始掉卡。。。搞什么。。。还有豪华版的主题铃音居然是英文。。。坑。。。。

在3月份发售的海王星U，等了7个月就到激次元组合布兰+涅普顿VS丧尸军团的发售
今次主角是布兰（因为第二届人气投票中布兰取得第一名，所以地雷社出下一部作品时布兰做主角）
这回主题是……学园+丧尸（让我想起了《学园默示录》，当然这款游戏就没那么血腥）
故事是游戏学园快闭园的时候，学生们为了能够维持下去借这次丧尸危机来拍摄电影作为青春的纪念
而且居然拍摄途中选择特定角色，拍摄时就会出现该特定角色（所以全CG收集注意这一点）
手感跟前作海王星U差不多（我用手柄的）
而且这作有联机（在之前首发那时候联机都有时候跳出，直到现在更新到1.03时稳定多了）
再说今次优化很好，我的渣渣GT240卡都能够到60帧
角色方面依旧4女神+4候补生，电击子、Fami通外还加了神次元的普鲁鲁和碧谢和V2里的Uzume，还有制作本游戏的工作室Tamsoft也加入战场了（Tamsoft的CV是小清水亚美）
PS：PSVita在三个月前就出了中文版。。。。何时来steam的中文版。。。。。
PS2：神次元偶像何时来Steam。。。。怨念。。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198125309957', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1476302953}
review:
+1 IDK what everyone is complaining about so much for? unlike all the other neptunia games on steam this port actually seems better as I did not even have to edit .ini files or change compatibility settings to get it to go fullscreen at 1920 x 1080 resolution but if you are having a problem with getting resolution or fullscreen to work try out this general fix for neptunia games below (fixes the main neptune games at least as every single neptunia game on steam has problems):

all you do is right click the game in library then go to properties then go to local files and right click the application thing (should have a picture of one of the characters so easy to find) then go all the way down to properties and hit compatibility tab then if you have windows 10 like me put the game in compatibility mode for windows 7 (windows 8 or xp1 might work too) then look at bottom of page under settings and click "disable display scaling" and "run as administrator" then hit the apply button and play game! and enjoy some more of our beloved NEP NEP!!!

this site might help too: http://www.chaoshour.com/articles/fixes/megatagmension-steam-broken-faulty-crashing-freezing-loading-screen-problem-bugs-glitches-fix

but to get on with my review, i have every single neptunia game except the spin-offs so i figured after seeing this on steam that I should give it a shot and so far I am glad I did! This neptunia game unlike the main games has a more Dynasty warriors style of combat (which I enjoy its a nice change) and it is quite fun!! the ability to pick and use any character is cool especially considering the co-op which is unique. The music is cool and the comedy has not yet dissapointed me! This is classic nep-nep so if you dare call yourself a nepper you will buy this game on ps vita and steam NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! (ANGRY BLANC VOICE)

I love nep-nep i honestly will buy any neptunia product just because the characters are so awesome and hilarious (though the nep sisters come first!!)

EDIT: now that I have completed the game and got my fill of nep I can say for sure that this is a great neptunia game its the first spin-off game of the series that i have actually bought it does not have anywhere near as long of a story or content as the main games have though but thats to be expected right? other than the really short storyline and lack of content for replay value i thouroughly enjoyed this experience like any other neptunia game I definetly recommend you buy it if you find a good sale on the game

review:
ซอมบี้แต่ละตัว  เสียงน่าร๊ากกกกกก มีความกาว ถือว่าชอบๆ 
เกมเพลยดี จำปุ่มเยอะนิดหน่อย  แต่ไม่เกินความสามารถ แนะนำควรใช้จอยเล่น 
โหมด  Co-op   ห้องบัคบ่อยไปนิด  หรือว่าเป็นที่ผมคนเดียวก็ไม่รู้
ไม่มีอะไรจะมันส์ไปกว่า  โซโร่ บอสCo-op 1-1  (ไม่มีคนคบ)
ข้อสรุป  ดีมากกก 9/10  หักเรื่อง  เนื้อเรื่องสั้นไปนิด และ โหมดCo-op  ที่ยังไม่ค่อยสเถียรนัก  ถ้าดีแล้ว  คง10/10  แน่นอน

author: {'steamid': '76561198194338934', 'num_games_owned': 2985, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1483722495}
review:
就连海王星也开始打僵尸了！！
为了拯救面临倒闭的学校，N（？）名少女站了出来，成为了偶像（雾）！
过场剧情的人物可以根据选择的角色改变！
比起U要难，打击感比原来要好很多，还有多人游戏！但为什么一直只有我一个人。。

[spoiler]可以偷拍四女神裙底[/spoiler]
话说谁知道药水怎么用？





心疼钱包，垃圾海王星，毁我人生[spoiler]所以下一作什么时候出[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198013855113', 'num_games_owned': 358, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2052, 'last_played': 1582417391}
review:
This is by far my favorite Neptunia gam simply 'cause Blanc's the main character!
The gameplay took some time getting used to, but i've gotten the hang of it now. 

You'll like this if you like:
++Neptunia, especially Blanc.
++ Neptunia: Action Unleashed like gameplay, with insanely fun Boss Battles in the multiplayer mode.
++ Multiplayer. A first time for a Nep game, but i think it's implemented very well. (Still a bit buggy at the time of writing)
++ The story is your typical Neptunia lighthearted stuff, with the addition of a school setting and zombies... so win/win.

So go ahead and get it!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981543135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 233, 'playtime_forever': 917, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1476122970}
review:
MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies est un beat'em all du meme style que Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed. Alors que je n'avais pas aimé ce dernier pour sa grosse répétitivité et l'absence de contenu, j'ai préféré ce nouveau spin-off.
Il y a eu quelques améliorations surtout au niveau du scénario très orienté humour, le système de médailles a été enlevé (ouf!) et les combats sont un peu plus interessants avec quelques attaques a esquiver sur les plus gros monstres.
Certes il reste assez limité surtout sur le contenu, sa manque de quêtes, d'armes et accessoires. Attendez vous a une dizaine d'heures pour la "story" en ayant grind un peu, sa fait peu mais le jeu reste plaisant avec les différents personnages de la série et quelques nouveau (mention spéciale pour Tamsoft qui est pour moi le perso le plus interessant a jouer).

A prendre en promo si vous etes apprécié la série et aimé le genre sinon passez votre chemin, il y a mieux en beat'em all!


Points positifs :
-Personnages équilibrés et emblématique de la série.
-Possibilité de placer les accessoires comme on veut (positionement dans l'espace).
-Présence d'un multijoueur avec des quetes inédites (faisable en solo).


Points négatifs : 
-Les programmes a mettre sur les armes ont un certaine durabilité, ils faut en acheter/craft plusieurs du coup. Dans ce cas la pourquoi ne pas les avoir fait permanent?
-Niveau trop court en général, sa se plie en quelques secondes pour le début du moins.
-Jeu globalement trop facile.
-Certains personnages ont des combos beaucoup trop simples et si on a pas débloqué toutes les "techniques" ils sont vite ennuyant a jouer.
-Le lock est a revoir : il est très imprécis, la caméra est trop zoomé et on le perds quand on se transforme.
-Chargement dans le menu ou on peut customiser et lancer les missions du jeu un peu long malgré que le jeu soit sur SSD.
-Peu d'armes, acessoires un peu limités et grind complétement RNG sur les "trésors" et les "Processors/Dark history parts", c'est infame comme systeme !
-Il manque une liste avec ce qu'on peut avoir sur telle scènes ou monstres, sur internet celle ci n'ont pas été mis a jour pour la version PC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089219484', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1036, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1515318393}
review:
30 minutes on this game and already encountered a crash. Not that i don't like it because of that, but just saying.
At the start of the story some sound files crashed my whole game for some reason. 

Probably shouldn't really go into detail, this isn't a bug report thing.

Anyway. I like this game already and hope they fix the bugs and crashes. This game can really evolve into something great.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100069082', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 415, 'last_played': 1476507664}
review:
很好的萌豚向游戏，无论是剧本、人设还是游戏过程都很赞，地雷社的良心作品。
但是程序优化略显糟糕。作为只玩了一部分单机剧情的玩家，就我目前所遇到的情况来看，主要是改变分辨率时的响应时间太过漫长，游戏间隙的读取时间对于这样一个游戏来说感觉也稍显长了些。同时，在全屏状态下经常在开始游戏时卡死。最后，我还有一个问题希望能得到帮助：为何在使用个人模式的商店时这个页面的画面会卡住，但是游戏的其他部分运转正常？有没有比较好的解决方案呢

author: {'steamid': '76561198103660627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1504875225}
review:
面对废校的危机，4名女神和4名候补生站了出来，她们的目标是成为偶像！
个人感觉着一作没有u良心，只有一个剧情模式可以走，u还有游戏塔和业界坟墓，而且分辨率固定在1024。所以不太推荐本作
不过nep11/10！！！买买买

author: {'steamid': '76561198115896344', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1510287275}
review:
这代给我的感觉是像从家里走出来一样（作为卖点的coop！？）
对我来说，吸引人的除了剧情以外就是coop了
玩了2小时左右，总的来说：1、画面依旧如此（为何配置栏的却更改了...）2、BGM不错 3、攻击连击方面相较于U稍加些平滑与流畅，手感也更好些 4、AI敌人还是如此“无脑”（不过发现前几代都是这样= =）5、房间进出问题有些严重，刚开游戏如果先搜索房间再退出自创房间就会未响应，有些等待中的房间进不去，游戏中有人加入不成功的话加入对话框就一直闪个不停 6、享受X3见到活人的感觉真好
最后，如果你想成为原力侠的话，请自己单刷吧.....
再最后，给好评是因为地雷炒饭确实有一套

author: {'steamid': '76561198089733021', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 2256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1638, 'last_played': 1478221344}
review:
对比U：
多了多人
打击感更强（还挺不错
技能和连击经过小改进，稍微优化游戏的体验
场景更大
多了4个
联机BOSS还挺好玩的，摸行动方式的时候还挺有趣
好感度有EVENT！动力和豚力UP

缺点：
场景更大是摆设
崩溃是日常
好友联机基本全靠脸
箱子的掉落没有说在哪掉，说实话我也没细看联机的掉落...但是稍微看了一眼，箱子的掉落貌似是没有提示的，全靠摸索？
boss就那几个，而且强度又不高，用鸡鸭全单刷过了...基本后期不联机也能刷榜
故事模式的任务，实在是比U还枯燥...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025336554', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1476048547}
review:
Had 4 friends all purchase this game on a whim. Within 30 minutes of struggling to get multiplayer to work the game crashed at least 4 times each. In the end the game tossed me into servers with other people, even though I was connecting to a password protected lobby. 

Too much of a hastle, my friends and I just modded Left 4 Dead until it was indistinguishable from this game. Not only was that cheaper, but much more fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980389571', 'num_games_owned': 1312, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1520442453}
review:
Oof. I'm a big fan of the Neptunia series but this game is in a rough place. Great cast of characters, and I'm excited to finally have a Nep action game where I can play Uzume, but the camera controls are in a rough place and the gameplay is very anemic. Where I've already put 25 hours into Nep U, I'm not sure I'll break 15 on this. Multiplayer may add some staying power, but it's currently not working reliably.

I'm hoping IFI takes care of business and I'm able to flip this review, but for now, if you don't have either, buy Hyperdimension Neptunia U instead of this game. It plays like this game should, and has much more content.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146466559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 3251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2968, 'last_played': 1690072586}
review:

其次，战斗系统比海王星U有了不少改进，联网功能大赞！游戏优化的也不错。故事内容so so。价格依然是惯例的首周-40%。

review: 看到名字的一瞬间 我以为这是涅普、布兰大战丧尸的故事    但玩了第一章我发现我错得离谱   这是一个为了拯救快被废弃的学校而拍摄丧尸电影的故事 不过你们守护女神也算是业界偶像了 为啥要不去当一名偶像呢  拥有超强身体能力的你们也可以去参加坦克两项来避免废校危机的啊

author: {'steamid': '76561198066702607', 'num_games_owned': 576, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1485689464}

author: {'steamid': '76561198313524370', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 742, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1480144534}
review:
第一次入海王星系列的正版，感觉以后也会信仰充值………………
听说这一作是PSV的移植，本来还有点担心画质问题，结果发现画质还不错（某位和我联机的小伙伴非常高兴的告诉我紫妹的胖次是○色的）
我没有玩过U，所以不知道以前的U是怎么魔性的，但这一作打击感不错，打起来挺过瘾（不过布大锤身为主角居然不是新手用不科学）
剧情什么的能看萌妹子卖萌就够
联机这个有点问题，要将下载区改成其它地方才可以正常进入房间，中国的下载区一进房间应用就会暂停工作…………什么鬼！
关于全部都是英文这个问题，3大妈已经出了汉化补丁，我已经用过了，汉化还可以，正版联机可以用，各位英文渣快上啊(/≧▽≦/)
最后说一下，地雷社快打折，好让我信仰充值！！（你刚刚不还是个正常人么？！）

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 1085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1085, 'last_played': 1476242348}
review:
《MegaTagmension Blanc + Neptune VS Zombies》（簡稱《MegaTagmension》）是繼承前作《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》無雙割草玩法的動作角色扮演遊戲，從世界觀背景設定來看，本作屬於外傳性質作品，四女神與女神候補生活躍的舞台從【遊戲業界】轉變為【私立遊戲學園】，以女神為主要教育對象的私立遊戲學園因為少子化現象導致學生不足，沒過多久就會被勒令廢校。同時校內又傳出不知從何發生的殭屍災情，在這種屋漏偏逢連夜雨的糟糕處境之下，身兼女主角與電影社社長的 Neptune 和毛遂自薦勝任編劇一職的 Blanc ，她們決定攜手合作，結合眾人之力拍攝出一部 B 級殭屍電影以便參加素人電影選拔大賽，如果成功取得優勝，那麼或許能夠吸引新生入校，幫助學園免除廢校命運。

既然《MegaTagmension》是款關於殭屍電影的遊戲，單人戰役幾乎百分之九十劇情都是女神們在自編自導自演，無厘頭又肆無忌憚地惡搞電影業界不成文的【好萊塢公式】，例如：一開始登場的夥伴會在關鍵時刻背叛你、明明可以逃走卻硬要留下斷後送死、死去的神秘角色是主角失散多年的親人、反派放出殭屍卻讓自己被咬死等等。令人感到遺憾的地方是劇情與關卡內容幾乎沒有任何關聯性，像是劇情明明進展到萬年臨演 Norie 突變成殭屍攻擊 Blanc ，進入關卡後卻是要求玩家在時間限制內斬殺特定數量敵人，就連被 Neptune 推薦飾演黑幕大魔王的 Plutia 都只演出短短數幕，隨即便拔下大魔王一角，如果製作團隊能夠真的將劇情和關卡內容同步連貫，遊戲體驗肯定會比當前版本好上百倍。


關於戰鬥系統的缺點其實很明顯，角色施展大招時非常容易打空，不知道是否為製作團隊想要讓整體難度上升所作的決定，還是純粹是設計上的失誤，大招影響範圍比起前作不僅大幅縮水，還不會附加群體定身效果，玩家會很常發現施展大招到一半，敵人居然大搖大擺【慢步走出】招式範圍，除非像是大魔王等級的怪物（這種怪物血量多且機動性差），不然很少怪物會完整吃完整套傷害。這種現象造成所謂的【大招無用論】，筆者個人愛用角 Iris Heart 就是一個很好的例子，她的普攻範圍大又廣，就算不出大招也能打出可觀傷害，可是當你使用大招後會看到女王大人不斷對著空氣抽鞭子，抽完鞭子後立馬變回羅莉型態，那還不如不出招式比較省事，反正用普攻打到底也不會取得較差的關卡評價。


相同於前作，開始遊戲進入選單界面時，點選【Action】就能依照建議等級展開電影拍攝作業，玩家最多可選擇兩名角色參戰，同時配置輔助角色在戰鬥時為你施放增益效果，前作不人性的角色限定任務不存在於本作，也就是說我們能夠用一隻角色一路打到通關，不需要花費精力去培育其他不感興趣的角色。這項設定對想要快速通關或是對特定角色較不擅長的玩家可說是一大福音，不過相對地讓耐玩度大幅下降，不是有意要獲得全成就的玩家，有些角色可能永遠都不會拿來使用（筆者個人就對黑國姊妹花興致缺缺）。

真的要提到《MegaTagmension》與《Hyperdimension Neptunia U》最大不同之處，就在於本作並未收錄前作廣受好評的【服裝破壞系統】，玩家無法再次欣賞到女神們被怪物欺負到遍體鱗傷，衣衫不整地倒在地上臉紅喘息的美景。儘管製作團隊提升了招式變化性、登場人物數量、以及新增多人連線模式想要帶給玩家更美好的遊戲體驗，但少了爆衣系統就好似大口享用炸物時少了一杯冰涼碳酸飲料陪襯，由衷希望未來《Hyperdimension Neptunia》系列如果還有機會推出新的無雙割草遊戲，請務必要讓服裝破壞系統復活啊！


關鍵問題來了，所以說《MegaTagmension》是款值得一玩的作品嗎？這個問題會因為詢問者不同而有兩種完全相反的答案，如果你是系列作死忠粉絲，其實筆者想不到任何阻止你去購買本作的動機，《Hyperdimension Neptunia》系列一直以來就不是透過遊戲本身所呈現的內容去吸引玩家，人物設定和誇張無厘頭的歡樂氣氛才是粉絲最津津樂道的部分。如果現在用專業動作遊戲玩家的身分來看這款遊戲，它的玩法從開始到結束都沒有特別突出的變化，遊玩一輪就可以解鎖大部分成就更是讓耐玩度大幅下降，除了登場角色數量值得給予正面評價之外，其餘部分都僅能獲得【差強人意】之中庸偏差評價。


優點：
+白國子民歡呼吧！主角由遊戲業界支持票數第一 White Heart 領銜主演。
+可操縱角色上升至十四名，武士刀專精廠商娘 Tam Soft 首次登場之作。
+新增多人連線模式，與主線劇情完全獨立的四人協力關卡等你來挑戰。


缺點：
-不管是從遊戲性還是玩法變化性來看，表現都差強人意，及格邊緣水準。
-服裝破壞系統慘遭移除，實在搞不懂為何要拋棄前作擁有的優質設定呢？


結論：與前作相比變化不大 ，白國子民必須直接入手，普通玩家建議等折扣。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/10/megatagmension-blanc-neptune-vs-zombies.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198161574225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 943, 'last_played': 1475995314}
review:
Nice game!

The missions take usually about 30-60 seconds and only boss fights can take more time.

Before you play you must know:

-	game is like U: action only the camera control can be tricky some time as you fight a 6-7 times bigger enemy so prepare to see mostly only the legs of the bosses.
-	the story is the least good of all Neptune game, but if you liked the other games you will like this as well
-	Multiplayer it sill buggy as I write this but I could get in teams at least a couple of times so later it will surely get better(and you can do multiplayer fight alone as well)
-	 the humour and style is the same as before
-	Uni and some other character attack style changed so you cannot own all enemy so easily with them like before… that’s  great because some of them was to over powered (and some still remain, but that’s not bad)
So if you liked U: Action you will love this to and will make you wait for the next game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198017087470', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 1165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 404, 'last_played': 1511395459}
review:
Did you like Nep U? if you didn't then this isn't for you either. If you haven't played Nep U then this a basic third person action game that was first released on the Vita as such the levels short and the gameply basic as it made with playing on the go in mind.

If you have never played a Nep game before I personally would play Rebirth One first as thats a much better way to get to know the CPU's.

If you did like Nep U then Blanc vs the zombies is a better more polished version of that with multiplayer online co-op and this time the enemys are more active with some of the larger mobs having skills you actully have to watch out for and dodge. Plus this time the cloths dont break which I regard as a good thing though you might not.

On the technical side of things at the time of writing this review some people (including me) are having issues where you have to play windowed at 720P (cant change) or you just get a black screen, Though if you do play in a winow is runs flawlessly. So check to community hub before you buy if thats the sort of thing to put you off.
